title: GATES / MEASUREHEAD
description: An übermensch monolith guarding the button to the harbour office door. Into "science"-anthropometry based racial theory.

dialogueTree.title: Measurehead: ""YOUR RACE DESCENT HAS TEMPORARILY..."
dialogueTree.text: "YOUR RACE DESCENT HAS TEMPORARILY HALTED. BUT YOU WILL FALL AGAIN."

dialogueTree.title: Measurehead: ""DO NOT PRESUME THIS HAS DRASTICALL..."
dialogueTree.text: "DO NOT PRESUME THIS HAS DRASTICALLY ALTERED OUR RACE DYNAMIC."

links.title: You: ""I knocked you out like a god of ma..."
links.text: "I knocked you out like a god of martial arts."

links.title: Measurehead: ""TRUE. I SAID NOTHING ABOUT OUR PER..."
links.text: "TRUE. I SAID NOTHING ABOUT OUR PERSONAL DYNAMIC -- THAT HAS ALTERED." He adds: "A LITTLE."

links.title: Authority: "He means *very* little."
links.text: He means *very* little.

links.title: You: ""It was just something I had to do.""
links.text: "It was just something I had to do."

links.title: Measurehead: ""OUR PERSONAL DYNAMIC HAS CHANGED."..."
links.text: "OUR PERSONAL DYNAMIC HAS CHANGED." He pauses for a second. "A LITTLE."

dialogueTree.title: Measurehead: "The man is still knocked out. He br..."
dialogueTree.text: The man is still knocked out. He breathes slowly and steadily.

links.title: Endurance: "It'll take a few moments for him to..."
links.text: It'll take a few moments for him to recover.

links.title: You: ""I need to find a way to turn back..."
links.text: "I need to find a way to turn back time."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU ARE A POOR PLAYER OF PHYSICAL..."
links.text: "YOU ARE A POOR PLAYER OF PHYSICAL CHESS." He lets go of your head. You slump to the ground.

links.title: You: ""Don't be such an asshole to your f..."
links.text: "Don't be such an asshole to your fellow dockworker." (Show him the stolen ID card.)

links.title: Measurehead: "The man looks at you, silent and un..."
links.text: The man looks at you, silent and unmoving. His eyes burrow into the remnants of your soul.

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU ARE NOT SANTIAGO. SANTIAGO IS..."
links.text: "YOU ARE NOT SANTIAGO. SANTIAGO IS NOT YOU. EVEN THE PHRENICALLY IMPAIRED CAN SEE THIS."

links.title: You: ""Okay. I'll wait here, just take th..."
links.text: "Okay. I'll wait here, just take the body down. (Wait here while Measurehead goes.)

links.title: Measurehead: ""BABE, SEE THAT THEY STAY HERE THE..."
links.text: "BABE, SEE THAT THEY STAY HERE THE WHOLE TIME."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: "The woman's gaze follows Measurehea..."
links.text: The woman's gaze follows Measurehead as he leaves...

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: "She turns to you. "So, you guys are..."
links.text: She turns to you. "So, you guys are like cops or something?"

links.title: You: ""Why are you with Measurehead?""
links.text: "Why are you with Measurehead?"

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Look at him -- he's craniometric p..."
links.text: "Look at him -- he's craniometric perfection. Are you cops or what?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, we're the Law around here.""
links.text: "Yeah, we're the Law around here."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Cool. I like men with guns and pow..."
links.text: "Cool. I like men with guns and power." The woman twirls her hair. "I'm Katya by the way..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You hear that?" The lieutenant loo..."
links.text: "You hear that?" The lieutenant looks toward the yard. "That sound. He's *breaking* something."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Yeah, Jean-Luc must be really tear..."
links.text: "Yeah, Jean-Luc must be really tearing it up over there. I wish I could see it..."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: "The woman looks toward the yard. "J..."
links.text: The woman looks toward the yard. "Jean-Luc must be really tearing it up over there. I wish I could see it..."

links.title: You: ""I also wish I could see it.""
links.text: "I also wish I could see it."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Don't worry. Physical stuff like t..."
links.text: "Don't worry. Physical stuff like this is *really* easy for Measurehead. Mental stuff too. He's really spiritual, you know." She looks around.

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""It's late outside, isn't it? You g..."
links.text: "It's late outside, isn't it? You guys must really like doing what you do. To be out so late..." She turns to behold the behemoth appearing around the corner, approaching the gates.

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE CORPSE HAS BEEN REMOVED FROM T..."
links.text: "THE CORPSE HAS BEEN REMOVED FROM THE TREE." He brushes wooden flakes off his hands: "STAND DOWN AND CONGRATULATE YOURSELF. YOU HAVE SIDED WITH RACE VICTORY TODAY."

links.title: You: ""There has been no side-choosing. W..."
links.text: "There has been no side-choosing. We did what we had to do to keep order."

links.title: Measurehead: "He nods slowly. "AND WHAT YOU HAD T..."
links.text: He nods slowly. "AND WHAT YOU HAD TO DO -- WAS TO BECOME A UNION MAN FOR ALL TO SEE."

links.title: You: ""Thank you for your cooperation, Me..."
links.text: "Thank you for your cooperation, Measurehead."

links.title: Measurehead: ""FAREWELL, HAM SANDWICH. YOU ARE A..."
links.text: "FAREWELL, HAM SANDWICH. YOU ARE A UNION MAN FROM NOW ON."

links.title: Scab Leader: ""Look at you, RCM rent-a-cops!" A l..."
links.text: "Look at you, RCM rent-a-cops!" A loud voice booms in from below: "Guarding that bridge like Evrart's lapdogs, is this where it's at now? The RCM is for sale?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Spoken by a mercenary -- pretendin..."
links.text: "Spoken by a mercenary -- pretending to be a worker."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And who are you?" The lieutenant f..."
links.text: "And who are you?" The lieutenant fires back. "What is your business here? Why are your clothes four sizes too small for you?"

links.title: You: ""I'll work with whoever I want.""
links.text: "I'll work with whoever I want."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "A shrill laughter interrupts you, e..."
links.text: A shrill laughter interrupts you, echoing across Martinaise. It's Cuno! Then...

links.title: Scab Leader: "The man turns to look behind him --..."
links.text: The man turns to look behind him -- at the behemoth appearing around the corner, approaching him, walking past him...

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "A shrill laughter interrupts you, e..."
links.text: A shrill laughter interrupts you, echoing across Martinaise. Then...

links.title: You: ""Yes, I am an unbelievably corrupt..."
links.text: "Yes, I am an unbelievably corrupt cop. I am corrupt every opportunity I get."

links.title: You: ""That's none of your business.""
links.text: "That's none of your business."

links.title: You: ""I don't. I've seen enough of that..."
links.text: "I don't. I've seen enough of that dead body already."

links.title: You: ""Apparently so.""
links.text: "Apparently so."

links.title: You: ""We're just trying to keep things f..."
links.text: "We're just trying to keep things from going to shit."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Have you ever thought that maybe t..."
links.text: "Have you ever thought that maybe things *should* go to shit?" The woman twirls her hair. "I'm Katya by the way..."

links.title: You: ""Evrart told you to help us get the..."
links.text: "Evrart told you to help us get the body down from the tree."

links.title: Measurehead: ""SO IT WAS. YOU BESTED ME IN RACE C..."
links.text: "SO IT WAS. YOU BESTED ME IN RACE COMBAT TO REACH MY SUPERIOR, THEN HAD HIM GIVE ME AN ORDER. I SALUTE YOUR CUNNING, ENEMY. I WILL GO AND REMOVE THE BODY FROM THE TREE -- WITH MY BARE HANDS."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""You're so noble, Measurehead.""
links.text: "You're so noble, Measurehead."

links.title: Rhetoric: "There's a but."
links.text: There's a but.

links.title: Measurehead: ""BUT." He leans in and intones: "WH..."
links.text: "BUT." He leans in and intones: "WHILE I AM GONE SOMEONE MUST STAND GUARD ON THE BRIDGE. THAT SOMEONE NEEDS TO BE *YOU*."

links.title: Authority: "That would mean you're openly showi..."
links.text: That would mean you're openly showing the people that you're taking the Union's side.

links.title: You: ""Wait, that showing everyone that I..."
links.text: "Wait, that showing everyone that I'm taking orders from the Union."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YES. THAT IS PRECISELY WHAT IT MEA..."
links.text: "YES. THAT IS PRECISELY WHAT IT MEANS, HOMONCULUS. THIS IS NOT GOING TO HAPPEN ANY OTHER WAY."

links.title: You: ""Lieutenant, what if we don't want..."
links.text: "Lieutenant, what if we don't want to do that?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is the uncomfortable result o..."
links.text: "This is the uncomfortable result of not taking it down ourselves. I can live with the compromise."

links.title: Measurehead: ""LISTEN TO YOUR LITTLE FRIEND. HE I..."
links.text: "LISTEN TO YOUR LITTLE FRIEND. HE IS WISE IN HIS CHILDLIKE WAY. HIS MYSTERIOUS RACE MAY YET PROVE FIERCE COMPETITION TO MY HEROIC HAPLOGROUP."

links.title: You: ""Okay then." (Wait here while Measu..."
links.text: "Okay then." (Wait here while Measurehead goes.)

links.title: You: ""No, I'm not going to do that." (Ba..."
links.text: "No, I'm not going to do that." (Back off.)

links.title: Measurehead: ""FINE. GOOD-BYE. RETURN TO YOUR DEG..."
links.text: "FINE. GOOD-BYE. RETURN TO YOUR DEGENERACY."

links.title: Measurehead: ""SO IT WAS. YOU SURMOUNTED THE HARB..."
links.text: "SO IT WAS. YOU SURMOUNTED THE HARBOUR WALL IN A DISPLAY OF ATHLETIC PROWESS TO REACH MY SUPERIOR -- THEN HAD HIM GIVE ME AN ORDER. I SALUTE YOUR CUNNING AND I WILL REMOVE THE BODY FROM THE TREE -- WITH MY BARE HANDS."

links.title: Measurehead: ""SO IT WAS. MY UNPROMISING RACE PUP..."
links.text: "SO IT WAS. MY UNPROMISING RACE PUPIL ENTERED THE HARBOUR AND USED MY SUPERIOR TO GIVE ME ORDERS. I SALUTE YOUR CUNNING AND WILL REMOVE THE BODY FROM THE TREE -- WITH MY BARE HANDS."

links.title: You: ""You serve the Union, don't you? Ar..."
links.text: "You serve the Union, don't you? Aren't they... white?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""DON'T BE VULGAR. WHITE OR NOT HAS..."
links.text: "DON'T BE VULGAR. WHITE OR NOT HAS GOT LITTLE TO DO WITH THIS. THE *RACE ENIGMA* RUNS MUCH DEEPER THAN THAT." He turns his eyes towards the harbour, seemingly bored with you.

links.title: Authority: "There must be *some* friction there..."
links.text: There must be *some* friction there. He's keeping it well hidden, however...

links.title: You: ""Yeah but you still *serve* him. Ho..."
links.text: "Yeah but you still *serve* him. How does that factor into your life?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""MR. CLAIRE IS A MAN OF VISION AND..."
links.text: "MR. CLAIRE IS A MAN OF VISION AND MEANS. HE HAS THE WILL TO CONFRONT POLYCULTURAL CAPITAL -- SOMETHING *YOUR* RACE NAIVISTIC COMMUNISTS NEVER DID."

links.title: Measurehead: ""ALSO -- TO SERVE IS NOBLE, IT TAKE..."
links.text: "ALSO -- TO SERVE IS NOBLE, IT TAKES DISCIPLINE. YOUR PETULANT INDIVIDUALISM HAS ONLY CONTRIBUTED TO YOUR *RACE FAILURE*. IT IS LAX AND MORONIC."

links.title: You: ""Yeah but you still *serve* them. H..."
links.text: "Yeah but you still *serve* them. How does that factor into your life?"

links.title: You: ""You keep telling yourself that.""
links.text: "You keep telling yourself that."

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry, of course. I understand..."
links.text: "I'm sorry, of course. I understand now. Deeper."

links.title: Measurehead: ""MR. CLAIRE IS A MAN OF VISION AND..."
links.text: "MR. CLAIRE IS A MAN OF VISION AND MEANS. HE HAS THE WILL TO CONFRONT INTERNATIONAL CAPITAL, WHICH IS SOMETHING YOUR RACE NAIVISTIC COMMUNISTS NEVER DID."

links.title: You: ""I'm no communist.""
links.text: "I'm no communist."

links.title: Measurehead: ""OF COURSE YOU ARE, REVACHOLIAN MAN..."
links.text: "OF COURSE YOU ARE, REVACHOLIAN MAN. THE FAILURE OF COMMUNISM TO CHALLENGE THE WORLD ORDER IS THE CORE OF YOUR RACE FATE. ALL AROUND YOU, THE FRUITS OF ITS DEFEAT: INDIVIDUALISM, ROCK AND ROLL MUSIC, SEXUALLY TRANSMITTED DISEASE..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""ABOVE ALL -- RAMPANT MULTINATIONAL..."
links.text: "ABOVE ALL -- RAMPANT MULTINATIONAL FINANCE STILL REIGNING LARGE. TELL ME, WHERE HAVE YOU GOTTEN YOUR LOVE OF PATHETIC COMMUNISM FROM?" He leans closer. "DEGENERATE YOUTH CULTURE? ROCK AND ROLL MUSIC?"

links.title: You: ""Communism is pretty cool.""
links.text: "Communism is pretty cool."

links.title: Measurehead: ""IDIOTIC COMMUNISM IS THE SINGLE GR..."
links.text: "IDIOTIC COMMUNISM IS THE SINGLE GREATEST CONTRIBUTOR TO YOUR RACE DESCENT. EVERYWHERE AROUND YOU, THE FRUITS OF ITS FAILURE TO CHALLENGE THE WORLD ORDER: INDIVIDUALISM, ROCK AND ROLL MUSIC, SEXUALLY TRANSMITTED DISEASES..."

links.title: You: ""Individualism is my jam.""
links.text: "Individualism is my jam."

links.title: Measurehead: ""JAM. INDIVIDUALISM. YOU HAVE GOTTE..."
links.text: "JAM. INDIVIDUALISM. YOU HAVE GOTTEN THESE IDEAS FROM DEGENERATE YOUTH CULTURE, HAVE YOU NOT? YOU HAVE PICKED THEM UP FROM ROCK AND ROLL SONGS?"

links.title: You: ""I said I'm *not* a communist. I do..."
links.text: "I said I'm *not* a communist. I don't know who I am but that's one thing I know."

links.title: Measurehead: ""STOP EXPLAINING YOURSELF, NO ONE C..."
links.text: "STOP EXPLAINING YOURSELF, NO ONE CARES ABOUT YOUR BELIEFS. THE CONVERSATION HAS MOVED ON. TELL ME WHAT DEGENERATE SUB-CULTURE HAS MADE YOU DRESS IN THIS SHAMEFUL WAY?"

links.title: You: ""I have gotten it from disco, actua..."
links.text: "I have gotten it from disco, actually."

links.title: Measurehead: ""OFFSHOOTS OF THE SEMENESE PEOPLE I..."
links.text: "OFFSHOOTS OF THE SEMENESE PEOPLE INVENTED DISCO WHILE HAVING SEX UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF COCAINE. IT IS A SHAME UPON MY RACE -- BUT WHAT IS DONE IS DONE."

links.title: Measurehead: ""I AM NOT SURPRISED YOU ENJOY IT SO..."
links.text: "I AM NOT SURPRISED YOU ENJOY IT SO MUCH. THIS HAS HAPPENED TO MANY OF THE SIDE-PRODUCTS OF THE INEVITABLE CULTURAL VICTORY OF THE SEMENESE RACE."

links.title: You: ""Okay, I'll ask -- who are the *Sem..."
links.text: "Okay, I'll ask -- who are the *Semenese*?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE SOUTH ISLAND RACE, HAPLOGROUP..."
links.text: "THE SOUTH ISLAND RACE, HAPLOGROUP A4A. WE ARE THE RIGHTFUL MASTERS OF THE INSULINDIAN ARCHIPELAGO. WE DESCEND FROM THE AREOPAGITES OF ANCIENT PERIKARNASSIS AND ARRIVED HERE 4000 YEARS AGO. MILLENNIA BEFORE YOU."

links.title: Measurehead: ""WE ARE THE FUTURE. THAT IS ALL YOU..."
links.text: "WE ARE THE FUTURE. THAT IS ALL YOU NEED TO KNOW."

links.title: You: ""So you were born and raised on the..."
links.text: "So you were born and raised on the islands, before you moved to Revachol?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""I AM A DESCENDANT. THE NARROW STRE..."
links.text: "I AM A DESCENDANT. THE NARROW STREETS OF ULUNBUIR ARE WITH ME IN MY GENETIC DREAMS, I SEE YOUNG SEMENESE WOMEN WALK INTO THE GREY MASS ON *ILE DU FANTÔME*, WAITING ON IMMACULATE CONCEPTION FROM THE PALE."

links.title: You: ""So, you *did* come from the island..."
links.text: "So, you *did* come from the islands?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""NO." He cranes his head. "I HAVE H..."
links.text: "NO." He cranes his head. "I HAVE HEARD ABOUT IT. ON THE RADIO."

links.title: Suggestion: "He would be appreciative if you did..."
links.text: He would be appreciative if you did not further chase this line of inquire in front of the women.

links.title: You: ""So you're not really Semenese, you..."
links.text: "So you're not really Semenese, you're just from Revachol."

links.title: Measurehead: ""I'M FROM COURON..." He changes tac..."
links.text: "I'M FROM COURON..." He changes tactics: "AND NO, IT IS NOT *JUST* IN REVACHOL. THIS CITY IS CENTRAL TO THE SEMENESE STRATEGY. SPREADING THROUGH ITS TRADE NETWORKS OUR CULTURE WILL DOMINATE THE WORLD."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU HAVE HEARD ENOUGH ABOUT OUR PH..."
links.text: "YOU HAVE HEARD ENOUGH ABOUT OUR PHYLOGENETIC SECRETS FOR TODAY. YOU HAVE EXTINCTION TO COME TO TERMS WITH. THINK UPON IT."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU HAVE HEARD ENOUGH ABOUT OUR PH..."
links.text: "YOU HAVE HEARD ENOUGH ABOUT OUR PHYLOGENETIC SECRETS FOR TODAY. YOU HAVE EXTINCTION TO COME TO TERMS WITH -- AND *NEVER* GETTING THAT DEAD BODY DOWN FROM THE TREE."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU HAVE HEARD ENOUGH ABOUT OUR PH..."
links.text: "YOU HAVE HEARD ENOUGH ABOUT OUR PHYLOGENETIC SECRETS FOR TODAY. YOU HAVE EXTINCTION TO COME TO TERMS WITH -- AND *NEVER* GETTING INTO THE HARBOUR."

links.title: You: ""Cool.""
links.text: "Cool."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YES.""
links.text: "YES."

links.title: Conceptualization: "This could have made him more open..."
links.text: This could have made him more open to discussing the *Race Enigma" with you...

links.title: You: ""So... you did *not* come from the..."
links.text: "So... you did *not* come from the islands?"

links.title: You: ""Understood.""
links.text: "Understood."

links.title: Measurehead: ""GOOD.""
links.text: "GOOD."

links.title: You: ""I don't really know who the Semene..."
links.text: "I don't really know who the Semenese are. I've recently experienced head trauma."

links.title: Measurehead: ""I CAN SEE THAT. THE SEMENESE ARE T..."
links.text: "I CAN SEE THAT. THE SEMENESE ARE THE SOUTH ISLAND RACE. HAPLOGROUP A4A, THE RIGHTFUL MASTERS OF THE INSULINDIAN ARCHIPELAGO. WE DESCEND FROM THE AREOPAGITES OF ANCIENT PERIKARNASSIS -- AND ARRIVED HERE 4000 YEARS AGO."

links.title: You: ""Wonderful. I need to enter the har..."
links.text: "Wonderful. I need to enter the harbour now -- on police business."

links.title: Measurehead: ""WHAT YOU *NEED* IS TO COME TO TERM..."
links.text: "WHAT YOU *NEED* IS TO COME TO TERMS WITH EXTINCTION -- AND NEVER GETTING THAT DEAD BODY DOWN FROM THE TREE." He looks at the button behind him and the tattoos on his face move to reveal the smallest of smiles.

links.title: Measurehead: ""WHAT YOU *NEED* IS TO COME TO TERM..."
links.text: "WHAT YOU *NEED* IS TO COME TO TERMS WITH EXTINCTION -- AND NEVER GETTING INTO THIS HARBOUR." He looks at the button behind him. The tattoos on his face move to reveal the smallest of smiles.

links.title: You: ""Wonderful. We're done with this li..."
links.text: "Wonderful. We're done with this line of inquiry."

links.title: You: ""It's true, I am a rock and roll st..."
links.text: "It's true, I am a rock and roll star and a rebel."

links.title: Measurehead: ""ROCK AND ROLL IS MORIBUND, ONLY KO..."
links.text: "ROCK AND ROLL IS MORIBUND, ONLY KOJKOS LISTEN TO IT ANYMORE. THERE IS NO LIFE LEFT IN IT, MY PEOPLE ABANDONED IT LONG AGO. IT LEADS ONLY TO NEUROGENERATIVE HERPES AND HEROIN OVERDOSES."

links.title: You: ""Youth culture does not affect my t..."
links.text: "Youth culture does not affect my thinking."

links.title: Measurehead: ""OF COURSE IT DOES. YOU ARE A DEGEN..."
links.text: "OF COURSE IT DOES. YOU ARE A DEGENERATE INDIVIDUALIST AND A ROCK AND ROLL REBEL. A PAWN OF INTERNATIONAL FINANCE, JUST LIKE THE REST OF YOUR HAM-COLOURED RACE."

links.title: You: ""My jam is a mysterious *fourth* th..."
links.text: "My jam is a mysterious *fourth* thing."

links.title: You: ""Enough of this.""
links.text: "Enough of this."

links.title: Measurehead: "He looks toward the harbour, motion..."
links.text: He looks toward the harbour, motionless. The tattoos on his face like a web of stone.

links.title: You: ""Kim, what do you think about this?""
links.text: "Kim, what do you think about this?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think this racist is better than..."
links.text: "I think this racist is better than the last -- but the next racist will be the really good one."

links.title: Conceptualization: "That will be the..."
links.text: That will be the...

links.title: You: ""That will be our lucky racist!""
links.text: "That will be our lucky racist!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He will grant us three wishes.""
links.text: "He will grant us three wishes."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOUR PAEDOMORPHIC FRIEND HAS QUICK..."
links.text: "YOUR PAEDOMORPHIC FRIEND HAS QUICK WITS." He leans in to inspect: "A PROTRUDING OCCIPUT AND AN INDENTED ZYGOMATIC BONE..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant does not flinch."
links.text: The lieutenant does not flinch.

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU SHOULD KEEP HIM CLOSE. THE CON..."
links.text: "YOU SHOULD KEEP HIM CLOSE. THE CONGENITAL DEFECT OF FARSIGHTEDNESS DOES NOT RENDER HIM A COMPLETE INVALID. HE STILL HAS THE USE OF HIS MIND."

links.title: You: ""How do you know there will be a ne..."
links.text: "How do you know there will be a next racist?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There always is.""
links.text: "There always is."

links.title: Measurehead: ""RACE IS REALITY." He nods approvin..."
links.text: "RACE IS REALITY." He nods approvingly.

links.title: You: ""I liked the previous racist better..."
links.text: "I liked the previous racist better, actually."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmh." He seems surprised at your c..."
links.text: "Hmh." He seems surprised at your choice of racist, but then slowly nods.

links.title: Measurehead: ""THAT IS UNDERSTANDABLE. THE PREVIO..."
links.text: "THAT IS UNDERSTANDABLE. THE PREVIOUS RACIST WAS PROBABLY AN OCCIDENTAL, AND DID NOT PROVE A REAL ADVERSARY."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""These cops are just jealous, Jean-..."
links.text: "These cops are just jealous, Jean-Luc."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think anything about this...."
links.text: "I don't think anything about this. We're wasting our time having this conversation."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOUR PAEDOMORPHIC FRIEND IS RIGHT...."
links.text: "YOUR PAEDOMORPHIC FRIEND IS RIGHT. YOU SHOULD LEAVE HERE, WITH YOUR TAIL BETWEEN YOUR LEGS, CONTEMPLATING RACE EXTINCTION. I AM AN IMMOVABLE OBSTACLE."

links.title: You: ""Know anything about this mug?" (Sh..."
links.text: "Know anything about this mug?" (Show him the mug.)

links.title: Measurehead: "He does not so much as glance at th..."
links.text: He does not so much as glance at the object.

links.title: You: ""Know anything about it?""
links.text: "Know anything about it?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""STOP SHOWING ME YOUR PATHETIC CUP...."
links.text: "STOP SHOWING ME YOUR PATHETIC CUP. I HAVE NO INTEREST IN IT."

links.title: Drama: "He had nothing to do with it."
links.text: He had nothing to do with it.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Does he strike you as the kind of m..."
links.text: Does he strike you as the kind of man who puts mugs into trash?

links.title: You: ""This your kind of thing?""
links.text: "This your kind of thing?"

links.title: You: ""Put this into the trash lately?""
links.text: "Put this into the trash lately?"

links.title: You: ""Why are you not with the Hardie bo..."
links.text: "Why are you not with the Hardie boys?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""I AM NOT THE FIRST LINE OF DEFENCE..."
links.text: "I AM NOT THE FIRST LINE OF DEFENCE -- I AM THE LAST." He looks toward the coast, defiantly. "IN ADDITION, THESE SO-CALLED *HARDIE BOYS* ARE AN EFFEMINATE CLIQUE OF BODYBUILDERS. THEIR COMPANY IS SPIRITUALLY DEGRADING."

links.title: Drama: "You pick up on something artificial..."
links.text: You pick up on something artificial in his tone, like he's putting on an *act*. This is unlike him. He is usually more himself.

links.title: You: ""But you're all part of the Union?""
links.text: "But you're all part of the Union?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE HARDIE MANLETS ARE ON THE PAY..."
links.text: "THE HARDIE MANLETS ARE ON THE PAY OF THE COMPANY. I ANSWER TO THE UNION ALONE -- AND I DO THIS OUT OF *RACE HEROISM*. FINANCE IS AN ALIEN CONCEPT TO THE SEMENESE."

links.title: Measurehead: ""NOW LEAVE ME BE. I MUST LUXURIATE..."
links.text: "NOW LEAVE ME BE. I MUST LUXURIATE IN THE COMPANY OF MY WOMAN."

links.title: You: "Let it be."
links.text: Let it be.

links.title: Drama: "Yes, it was probably nothing."
links.text: Yes, it was probably nothing.

links.title: You: ""There's more to it. What have you..."
links.text: "There's more to it. What have you got against them?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""FINE. THEY HAVE RECENTLY FALLEN UN..."
links.text: "FINE. THEY HAVE RECENTLY FALLEN UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF A POSSIBLY SEXUALLY PERVERTED FEMALE VAGRANT AND A NARCOTICS PEDDLER. IT'S SHAMEFUL."

links.title: You: ""Who do you mean?""
links.text: "Who do you mean?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""FIND OUT FOR YOURSELF, ENDOMORPHIC..."
links.text: "FIND OUT FOR YOURSELF, ENDOMORPHIC BLOB."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Interesting." The lieutenant takes..."
links.text: "Interesting." The lieutenant takes a quick note.

links.title: You: ""What are those tattoos of yours su..."
links.text: "What are those tattoos of yours supposed to mean?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""RACISTS ARE GENERALLY NOT VERY GOO..."
links.text: "RACISTS ARE GENERALLY NOT VERY GOOD EXAMPLES OF THEIR RACE." He gestures toward the lorryman down the street...

links.title: Perception (Hearing): ""Welcome to Revachol!" you hear him..."
links.text: "Welcome to Revachol!" you hear him yell at a red-head woman visiting the Frittte nearby.

links.title: Logic: "He must think red-heads are immigra..."
links.text: He must think red-heads are immigrants.

links.title: Measurehead: ""I AM NOT LIKE THEM. I AM CRANIOMET..."
links.text: "I AM NOT LIKE THEM. I AM CRANIOMETRIC PERFECTION. I HAVE TAKEN THE TROUBLE TO PERMANENTLY DRAW A PHRENOLOGIC GRID ON MY SKULL AND FEATURES. THIS SHOULD DISPEL ANY DOUBT."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "True. That *is* a noble cranium --..."
links.text: True. That *is* a noble cranium -- but you got a hard noggin yourself!

links.title: Visual Calculus: "The drawings are precise and look t..."
links.text: The drawings are precise and look true to their pseudoscientific ambitions. One thing however -- it is not *entirely* free of throwbacks in the phylogenetic tree. His large jaw, for example, could be a trait indicative of criminalism. Also his ear lobes could be smaller.

links.title: You: ""Are you sure? I mean... that jaw i..."
links.text: "Are you sure? I mean... that jaw is clearly an atavistic stigmata."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""That atavistic stigmata makes puss..."
links.text: "That atavistic stigmata makes pussy say *yes, plenty*."

links.title: Measurehead: ""BABE, THANKS." The tattoos on his..."
links.text: "BABE, THANKS." The tattoos on his stone face briefly form a smile. "BUT I GOT THIS."

links.title: Suggestion: "You have him off guard now... he's..."
links.text: You have him off guard now... he's preoccupied with this situation with his woman.

links.title: You: ""Your ear lobes are too big.""
links.text: "Your ear lobes are too big."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE SIZE OF THE EAR LOBES IS NOT A..."
links.text: "THE SIZE OF THE EAR LOBES IS NOT A REAL CRANIOMETRIC CRITERIA. EVERYONE KNOWS THIS."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Your ear lobes are flawless, Jean-..."
links.text: "Your ear lobes are flawless, Jean-Luc."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YES..." The man falls silent, his..."
links.text: "YES..." The man falls silent, his face motionless.

links.title: You: ""You *sure* I'm not craniometricall..."
links.text: "You *sure* I'm not craniometrically superior to you?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU EXHIBIT FORWARD PROJECTION OF..."
links.text: "YOU EXHIBIT FORWARD PROJECTION OF THE JAW -- INDICATIVE OF SCHIZOPHRENIA AND SEXUAL INACCOUNTABILITY. FROM A PURELY AESTHETIC STANDPOINT, THE DIMPLE IN YOUR JAW MAKES YOU LOOK LIKE A BABY. THIS IS NOT CRANIOMETRY, JUST AN OBSERVATION."

links.title: You: ""What else?""
links.text: "What else?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO SEE ANY MORE O..."
links.text: "IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO SEE ANY MORE OF YOUR BONE STRUCTURE -- IT IS COVERED IN THE RAVAGES OF AL GUL. FROM WHAT REMAIN OF YOUR FEATURES, I CAN SEE *FLESHY LIPS*, *BALDNESS OF THE HEAD*, AND LONG ARMS RELATIVE TO LOWER LIMBS."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THIS LEADS ME TO CONCLUDE: YOU ARE..."
links.text: "THIS LEADS ME TO CONCLUDE: YOU ARE NOT A POLICE OFFICER. YOU ARE A COMMON CRIMINAL, AN OFFSPRING OF MURDERERS AND SAILORS FROM SUR-LA-CLEF AND VESPER; AND POSSIBLY EVEN THE DEGENERATE SHEEP HERDERS OF *UBI*."

links.title: You: ""Interesting -- so one of my ancest..."
links.text: "Interesting -- so one of my ancestors was Sur-La-Clef and the other Vesper?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOUR RACIAL HERITAGE IS UNINTEREST..."
links.text: "YOUR RACIAL HERITAGE IS UNINTERESTING. IT IS THE SAME AS ALL REVACHOLIANS. YOUR PARENTS AND THEIR PARENTS MADE THE DECISION TO REPRODUCE, WHILE UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF AL GUL. THAT IS THE ONLY REASON YOU ARE HERE."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "He's right there. It's almost impos..."
links.text: He's right there. It's almost impossible to *get it on* unless you're both drunk. It's too scary when people are sober.

links.title: You: ""That's enough.""
links.text: "That's enough."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU DO NOT WISH TO BE JUDGED, BECA..."
links.text: "YOU DO NOT WISH TO BE JUDGED, BECAUSE YOU ARE A GENETIC BLOB OF POLYCULTURAL DEFORMITIES. THIS IS UNDERSTANDABLE."

links.title: You: ""You're right. That's craniometric..."
links.text: "You're right. That's craniometric perfection. My race does not stand a chance."

links.title: Measurehead: ""CORRECT.""
links.text: "CORRECT."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOUR SILENCE BETRAYS YOUR INFERIOR..."
links.text: "YOUR SILENCE BETRAYS YOUR INFERIORITY. YOU DO NOT HAVE A REPLY. YOU SHOULD ENTER A DEEP RACE SLUMBER. PERHAPS IN FOUR THOUSAND YEARS THERE IS NEED FOR A SERVILE HOMONCULUS."

links.title: You: ""Let's go over that funky race clas..."
links.text: "Let's go over that funky race classification again."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THERE IS NOTHING *FUNKY* ABOUT THE..."
links.text: "THERE IS NOTHING *FUNKY* ABOUT THEM: THERE ARE THREE CATEGORIES OF RACE: TYPE A, TYPE B, AND THE VILE C-F RACE CAULDRON OF PEDERASTY. WHICH ONE DO YOU NEED?"

links.title: You: ""Type A.""
links.text: "Type A."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THOSE ARE THE SEMENESE, THE AREOPA..."
links.text: "THOSE ARE THE SEMENESE, THE AREOPAGITE, AND THE OCCIDENTALS -- EXCLUDING THE *MAUN* OF COURSE. THE MAUN ARE RIDDLED WITH ECZEMA TO THE POINT WHERE THEY FIND IT IMPOSSIBLE TO SMILE. THEY ARE ALL LACTOSE INTOLERANT -- A COMMON RESULT OF INBREEDING..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""A RECEDING GENETIC POOL HAS LED TH..."
links.text: "A RECEDING GENETIC POOL HAS LED THE MAUN ON REPREHENSIBLE STREET PARADES, IN MAUN CITIES LIKE STAADSKANAAL AND VREDEFORT, WEARING WOODEN CLOGS ON THEIR FEET, AND LITTLE GREEN TASSELS ON THEIR HATS."

links.title: You: ""Wait -- who exactly are the Maun?""
links.text: "Wait -- who exactly are the Maun?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU KNOW THEM BY THE NAMES OF THEI..."
links.text: "YOU KNOW THEM BY THE NAMES OF THEIR NATION STATES: *THE ORANJESE*, *THE GOTTWALDIANS* AND *THE KÖNIGSTEINERS*. MY PEOPLE SIMPLY CALL THEM *MAUN*."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "*Maun* is a derogative term for fir..."
links.text: *Maun* is a derogative term for first-world people of Gottwaldian descent. They do not *all* have eczema. Also, people of Katla, like the Suru and the Uuhu, are much more lactose intolerant.

links.title: You: "The wooden clogs, though?"
links.text: The wooden clogs, though?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "In some municipalities of Oranje, p..."
links.text: In some municipalities of Oranje, people do wear shoes made of wood to street parades. Green, orange, and even yellow tassels have also been seen on hats.

links.title: You: "Got it."
links.text: Got it.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "You're welcome."
links.text: You're welcome.

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE MAUN ARE PROOF THAT YOU CAN HA..."
links.text: "THE MAUN ARE PROOF THAT YOU CAN HAVE TOO MUCH OCCIDENTAL RACIAL PURITY -- AND TASSEL-CENTRIC CULTURE. INBREEDING HAS LED TO A LACTOSE INTOLERANT SUB-RACE WHOM NO ONE CAN TAKE SERIOUSLY."

links.title: Composure: "Colourful tassels are, let's be hon..."
links.text: Colourful tassels are, let's be honest, not a good sartorial choice for this century. You might want to avoid wooden clogs too.

links.title: You: ""Okay, got it. Who *are* type A the..."
links.text: "Okay, got it. Who *are* type A then, in your view?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE VESPERTINES AND MESSINIANS OF..."
links.text: "THE VESPERTINES AND MESSINIANS OF VESPER AND MESSINA; THE ANCIENT METEORANS OF METEO BY THE GOLDEN PISANTIC SEA, THE SURESNE OF SUR-LA-CLEF AND EVEN THE NORTH-KÖNIGSTEINERS -- ALL HAVE TYPE A RACE PROPENSITIES."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE OTHER LARGE MONDIAL CIVILIZATI..."
links.text: "THE OTHER LARGE MONDIAL CIVILIZATION -- THE MESQUE -- ARE TOO YELLOW AND OLEAGINOUS TO COUNT AS A HEROIC RACE; TRUE, THEY ARE VIOLENT AND EXPANSIONIST, BUT THEY HAVE A *GLANDULAR PROBLEM*..." He draws his finger across his face...

links.title: Measurehead: ""OVERPRODUCTION OF *SEBUM*. SEBUM I..."
links.text: "OVERPRODUCTION OF *SEBUM*. SEBUM IS LEAKING INTO THEIR BRAINS, MAKING THEM LISTEN TO *EL MARIACHI* MUSIC AND EAT TOXIC MINCED MEAT BASED FOOD. WHICH IN TURN ONLY PRODUCES MORE SEBUM."

links.title: You: ""And who are the Semenese and Areop..."
links.text: "And who are the Semenese and Areopagites in this?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""AS PROVEN BY THE MAUN AND THE MESQ..."
links.text: "AS PROVEN BY THE MAUN AND THE MESQUE, OCCIDENTAL TYPE A IS IN RETROGRADE; THE SEMENESE AND THE AREOPAGITE ARE ON THE ASCENT."

links.title: You: ""And the Semenese are...""
links.text: "And the Semenese are..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE INDIGENOUS PEOPLE OF THIS, THE..."
links.text: "THE INDIGENOUS PEOPLE OF THIS, THE INSULINDIAN ARCHIPELAGO. THE SEMENESE INHABIT THE SOUTHERN ISLANDS..." He gestures toward the South, across the ocean. "*I* AM SEMENESE -- FROM THE STOCK OF ULUNBUIR ON ILE DU FANTÔME."

links.title: You: ""And the Areopagites...""
links.text: "And the Areopagites..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE AREOPAGITES ARE THE MASTER RAC..."
links.text: "THE AREOPAGITES ARE THE MASTER RACE OF THE IILMARAAN DESERTS. THE SEMENESE ARE DESCENDANTS OF THE AREOPAGITES. WE CAME HERE DURING A *HEROIC MIGRATION* FROM IILMARAA TO INSULINDE. THOUSANDS OF YEARS BEFORE THE LACTOSE INTOLERANT, MAUN-RIDDEN OCCIDENTALS DISCOVERED THIS PLACE."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Wait, didn't *Iilmaraan desert pygm..."
links.text: Wait, didn't *Iilmaraan desert pygmees* invent alcohol and get pillaged just a short while ago?

links.title: You: ""Weren't the Iilmaraans pillaged by..."
links.text: "Weren't the Iilmaraans pillaged by *my people* and then Al Gul happened and all that?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""NO, THOSE WERE SCIMITAR WIELDING R..."
links.text: "NO, THOSE WERE SCIMITAR WIELDING RACE LOSERS OF SAHRAVA, YEESUT AND BASHIR, WITH THEIR HIMI SERVANTS. *BIG DIFFERENCE*. THE AREOPAGITES WERE FASTING AND CONQUERING WHILE THIS HAPPENED -- YOU NEVER PENETRATED THE WESTERN DUNES."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Jean, baby, you're on fire..." The..."
links.text: "Jean, baby, you're on fire..." The young woman looks adoringly.

links.title: Measurehead: ""I KNOW, BABE.""
links.text: "I KNOW, BABE."

links.title: You: ""What's the difference between the..."
links.text: "What's the difference between the Semenese and the Areopagites?" (Continue receiving wisdom.)

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE AREOPAGITES ARE SLEEK, LONG-HE..."
links.text: "THE AREOPAGITES ARE SLEEK, LONG-HEADED. THE SEMENESE ARE POWERFUL, MESOMORPHIC. THE FORMER IS AN IMMUTABLE PROGENITOR, UNCHANGED SINCE THE SUPER-ISOLA OF PERIKARNASSIS. ANCIENT BRAINS REST IN THEIR SLENDER SKULLS..." He falls silent, contemplating the beauty and the mystery.

links.title: Measurehead: "Then he continues: "THE LATTER IS P..."
links.text: Then he continues: "THE LATTER IS PERFECTED AND ADAPTING. TOGETHER THEY FORM THE SEMENO-AREOPAGITE OR *SEMEOPAGITE* SUPERRACE -- THAT IS ALL. THERE ARE NO MORE TYPE A RACES IN THE WORLD."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Nature was not capable of more."
links.text: Nature was not capable of more.

links.title: You: ""Type B.""
links.text: "Type B."

links.title: Measurehead: ""TYPE B ARE THE *UNHEROIC RACES*. A..."
links.text: "TYPE B ARE THE *UNHEROIC RACES*. AMORPHOUS NON-COMPETITORS OF THE GREAT RACE. THE KOJKOS AND THE VACHOLIERS, THEY ARE MUD COLOURED PEOPLE."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "The Kojkos of Graad (Yugo, Zsiemsk,..."
links.text: The Kojkos of Graad (Yugo, Zsiemsk, Shest et al) are what you would call, white, officer -- in a suspect description.

links.title: You: ""You said *Kojkos*. I've been train..."
links.text: "You said *Kojkos*. I've been trained to identify them as *white* in official  descriptions."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YES. TO AN UNTRAINED EYE THE KOJKO..."
links.text: "YES. TO AN UNTRAINED EYE THE KOJKO APPEAR WHITE AND PINKISH. LIKE A HAM SANDWICH. BUT LOOK INTO THEIR EYES AND YOU WILL SEE..." He squints, full of sage wisdom: "THEY ARE OF AN INDISTINCT COLOUR. AND SO IS THEIR SKIN: UNHEALTHY, MUDDY AND ASHEN..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""PINKNESS IS A RACIAL QUALITY THAT..."
links.text: "PINKNESS IS A RACIAL QUALITY THAT HAS TO BE EARNED THROUGH CENTURIES OF ADVANCED BALLISTIC WARFARE AND CULTURAL DOMINATION THAT THE GRAAD PEOPLE HAVE UNDERGONE FOR DRINKING AL GUL AND SMOKING THE DEGENERATE *TABAC* HERB... AND FOR EATING *POTATO*."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE KOJKO -- THE COUNTLESS MICRONA..."
links.text: "THE KOJKO -- THE COUNTLESS MICRONATIONALITIES OF GRAAD -- ARE ALL INEXPLICABLY OBSESSED WITH *POTAAT*. THE ONLY THING THEY LIKE MORE IS DIVIDING INTO MICROSCOPIC ETHNOSTATES. LIKE POLITICAL AMOEBA."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Wouldn't he be one *for* ethnostate..."
links.text: Wouldn't he be one *for* ethnostates?

links.title: You: ""Another traitor. I thought you of..."
links.text: "Another traitor. I thought you of all people would support the ethnostate."

links.title: Measurehead: ""DEMOCRATIC ETHNOSTATES ARE MICROSC..."
links.text: "DEMOCRATIC ETHNOSTATES ARE MICROSCOPIC. THEY BREED GENETIC MEDIOCRITY. THE SEMENO-AREOPAGITE SUPERSTATE WILL COVER THE *ENTIRE* REMAINING PLANETARY CRUST, UNINTERRUPTED FROM HOLY SEMENINE TO THE BOREAL PLATEAU OF KATLA."

links.title: Measurehead: ""ITS LEADERS WILL BE THE GENETIC EP..."
links.text: "ITS LEADERS WILL BE THE GENETIC EPITOME OF THE SEMENESE AND AREOPAGITE STOCK, ELECTED BY NATURE; NOT THE BASE, INERT SPOILAGE CALLED *DEMOS*."

links.title: You: ""You don't like ethnostates?""
links.text: "You don't like ethnostates?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""THEY ARE MICROSCOPIC. THE SEMENO-A..."
links.text: "THEY ARE MICROSCOPIC. THE SEMENO-AREOPAGITE SUPERSTATE WILL COVER THE *ENTIRE* REMAINING PLANETARY CRUST, UNINTERRUPTED FROM HOLY SEMENINE TO THE BOREAL PLATEAU OF KATLA."

links.title: You: ""And the *Vacholiers* you mentioned?""
links.text: "And the *Vacholiers* you mentioned?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""REVACHOLIANS -- HALF WAY BETWEEN T..."
links.text: "REVACHOLIANS -- HALF WAY BETWEEN TYPE A AND THE RACIAL CAULDRON. TOO MIXED TO KNOW RIGHT FROM WRONG. YOU TRIED YOUR DEGENERATE LITTLE REVOLUTION, WHICH WAS THE SINGLE GREATEST FAILURE COMMITTED BY HUMANS IN OUR 82,000 YEAR HISTORY ON THIS PLANET."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Is it 82,000 years that we've been..."
links.text: Is it 82,000 years that we've been recording history? You have very little idea of what is happening, but that seems a little off.

links.title: You: ""I'm pretty sure History hasn't las..."
links.text: "I'm pretty sure History hasn't lasted that long."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE MYSTERIES OF THE PEOPLE OF THI..."
links.text: "THE MYSTERIES OF THE PEOPLE OF THIS PLANET ARE A TRAGEDY THAT HAS PLAYED OUT COUNTLESS TIMES OVER, LIKE A FEVER DREAM OF SKIN, HAIR, AND BONE. WAKE UP -- NAIVE CHESS PIECE."

links.title: You: ""That Revolution sounds like it was..."
links.text: "That Revolution sounds like it was actually very good and necessary."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE REVOLUTION CAME TO REVACHOL FR..."
links.text: "THE REVOLUTION CAME TO REVACHOL FROM GRAAD, IN TZARAATH-RIDDEN POTATO CARTS -- IT IS LITERALLY AN ILLNESS. A PRION DISEASE THAT LEAVES THE PARIETAL AND FRONTAL LOBE RIDDEN WITH HOLES. A SOFT, SPONGELIKE MASS OF DEMENTIA, HALLUCINATIONS, AND PARANOIA..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE REVOLUTION IS *FATAL FAMILIAL..."
links.text: "THE REVOLUTION IS *FATAL FAMILIAL INSOMNIA*. A HEREDITARY PRION CONDITION PASSED FROM THE KOJKO TO THE OCCIDENTALS..." He pauses in theoretic self-reflection. "BUT NOT SEXUALLY, PROBABLY THROUGH TRADE ROUTES AND POTATE-ACID, THE PRIME COMPONENT OF THE POTATO PLANT..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""ENOUGH OF TYPE B MEDIOCRITY," he n..."
links.text: "ENOUGH OF TYPE B MEDIOCRITY," he nods, satisfied with the outcome.

links.title: You: ""That Revolution sounds like it was..."
links.text: "That Revolution sounds like it was perpetrated by degenerate marauders. Not all the people of Revachol."

links.title: You: "(Go away stupid political thoughts...."
links.text: (Go away stupid political thoughts.) "What was this Revolution?"

links.title: You: ""Mud-coloured?""
links.text: "Mud-coloured?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""TO AN UNTRAINED EYE THE KOJKO APPE..."
links.text: "TO AN UNTRAINED EYE THE KOJKO APPEAR WHITE AND PINKISH. LIKE A HAM SANDWICH. BUT LOOK INTO THEIR EYES AND YOU WILL SEE..." He squints, full of sage wisdom: "THEY ARE OF AN INDISTINCT, MUDDY COLOUR. AND SO IS THEIR SKIN: UNHEALTHY, SWEATY AND ASHEN..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""PINKNESS IS A RACIAL QUALITY THAT..."
links.text: "PINKNESS IS A RACIAL QUALITY THAT HAS TO BE EARNED THROUGH CENTURIES OF ADVANCED BALLISTIC WARFARE AND CULTURAL DOMINATION THAT THE GRAAD PEOPLE HAVE UNDERGONE FOR DRINKING AL GUL AND SMOKING THE DEGENERATE *TABAC* HERB... AND FOR EATING *POTATO*..."

links.title: You: ""The vile C-F race cauldron of pede..."
links.text: "The vile C-F race cauldron of pederasty, please."

links.title: Measurehead: ""I KNEW YOU WOULD GO STRAIGHT FOR T..."
links.text: "I KNEW YOU WOULD GO STRAIGHT FOR THE VILE CAULDRON -- EVERYONE DOES." He does not look surprised. "YOU NEED TO FIRST LEARN ABOUT TYPE A AND B TO APPRECIATE THE DEPRAVITY OF THE CHIMERIC RACES."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Yeah, I mean otherwise..." the wom..."
links.text: "Yeah, I mean otherwise..." the woman twirls her hair, "it just won't make any sense."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. It would seem *nonsensical*.""
links.text: "Yes. It would seem *nonsensical*."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU NEED TO KNOW BOTH TYPES *A* AN..."
links.text: "YOU NEED TO KNOW BOTH TYPES *A* AND *B* TO UNDERSTAND THE CONTEXT FOR THE RECKLESS GENETIC ABANDONMENT IN THE PHYLO-CAULDRON."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Yeah.." The young woman puts a pie..."
links.text: "Yeah.." The young woman puts a piece of chewing gum in her mouth. "You have to have context, you know."

links.title: You: ""The vile C-F race cauldron of pede..."
links.text: "The vile C-F race cauldron of pederasty, please."

links.title: Measurehead: ""TYPES C-F ARE A MUSEUM OF FAILED *..."
links.text: "TYPES C-F ARE A MUSEUM OF FAILED *CHIMERIC EXPERIMENTS* AND TRAGIC MAL-ADAPTATIONS. THEY ARE TORTURED CREATURES WAITING TO BE PUT TO SLEEP. YOUR MORBID INTEREST IN THEM WORRIES ME."

links.title: You: ""Chimeric experiments?""
links.text: "Chimeric experiments?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""LESSER RACES LIKE THE *MESQUITO*,..."
links.text: "LESSER RACES LIKE THE *MESQUITO*, A GROTESQUE MIXTURE OF A MESQUE WOMAN AND A SEMENESE MAN, ONLY POSSIBLE IF THE MOTHER IS MESQUE AND THE FATHER SEMENESE. THE OTHER WAY AROUND THEY FAIL TO PRODUCE OFFSPRING."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE MESQUITO IS BORN STERILE. LIKE..."
links.text: "THE MESQUITO IS BORN STERILE. LIKE A DONKEY..." He looks west, ruefully: "ALL THEY HAVE LEFT IS TO RIDE CUSTOMIZED MOTOR CARRIAGES WITH HYDRAULIC SUSPENSION, LISTENING TO AGGRESSIVE *EL MARIACHI* MUSIC TO VENT THEIR IMPOTENT DESPAIR."

links.title: Logic: "It seems unlikely that two human be..."
links.text: It seems unlikely that two human beings produce genetically sterile offspring.

links.title: You: ""Maybe I have misunderstood somethi..."
links.text: "Maybe I have misunderstood something, but aren't humans too similar to produce genetically sterile offspring."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU ARE RIGHT. YOU *HAVE* MISUNDER..."
links.text: "YOU ARE RIGHT. YOU *HAVE* MISUNDERSTOOD. YOU LACK BASIC PHYLOGENETIC EDUCATION."

links.title: Authority: "The sage will not budge on this."
links.text: The sage will not budge on this.

links.title: You: ""Any more?""
links.text: "Any more?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""THEN THERE IS... " He pauses drama..."
links.text: "THEN THERE IS... " He pauses dramatically. "THE SEMENO-KOJKIC CHIMERA. ARE YOU SURE YOU WISH TO KNOW OF THE SEMENO-KOJKIC CHIMERA? IT IS NOT AN AESTHETIC SIGHT."

links.title: You: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE KOJKO, AS YOU KNOW, ARE VERY S..."
links.text: "THE KOJKO, AS YOU KNOW, ARE VERY SERVILE. ESPECIALLY WHEN THEY MEET THE RICH-MAN. RACIAL SCIENTISTS HAVE TOYED WITH THE IDEA OF CROSSING THE SEMENESE WITH A KOJKO, TO PRODUCE A SUPER-WORKER OF SEMENESE STRENGTH AND GRAAD SERVILITY..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THIS WILL NEVER HAPPEN. THE SEMENE..."
links.text: "THIS WILL NEVER HAPPEN. THE SEMENESE AND THE KOJKO *MAY* HAVE SIMILAR INTERBREEDING PROBLEMS AS THE MESQUITO -- WE WILL NEVER KNOW PRECISELY. NO SEMENESE MAN COULD MAINTAIN AN ERECTION IN THE SUFFOCATING POTATO STENCH OF A KOJKO WOMAN, OR *KOJKA*.

links.title: Empathy: "There is a strange sadness in his t..."
links.text: There is a strange sadness in his tone. A less than heroic melancholy this time...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Your eyes bounce to the young woman..."
links.text: Your eyes bounce to the young woman at his side, twirling her hair. It is light brownish and eyes are a random colour...

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Wasn't she called *Katya*. A common..."
links.text: Wasn't she called *Katya*. A common name among the...

links.title: You: ""Isn't the name of your companion K..."
links.text: "Isn't the name of your companion Katya?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE HEART THAT PUMPS THE HAEMOGLOB..."
links.text: "THE HEART THAT PUMPS THE HAEMOGLOBIN IS MYSTERIOUS, AND SO IS ITS DARK WILL," he answers enigmatically. "ENOUGH OF THESE PERSONAL MATTERS. HAVE YOU BEEN EDUCATED TO ALL THE RASSO-TYPES NOW?"

links.title: Empathy: "He does not seem angry, nor does th..."
links.text: He does not seem angry, nor does the woman look affected. She just twirls her hair. Perhaps they've been through this and established an accord?

links.title: You: ""Potato coloured hair, random colou..."
links.text: "Potato coloured hair, random coloured eyes..." (Nod toward Measurehead's woman.)

links.title: You: ""You seem kinda blue about this, Me..."
links.text: "You seem kinda blue about this, Measurehead."

links.title: You: "Yeah, I'm not gonna bring this up."
links.text: Yeah, I'm not gonna bring this up.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Of course. Very tactical. This lead..."
links.text: Of course. Very tactical. This leads to dangerous places...

links.title: Measurehead: ""BUT ENOUGH. IT IS CRUEL TO ENTERTA..."
links.text: "BUT ENOUGH. IT IS CRUEL TO ENTERTAIN OURSELVES WITH THE DEFORMITIES OF TYPE C-F. WERE THERE ANY ABLE BODIED RACES YOU NEEDED EDUCATION ON?"

links.title: You: ""Better not to. The Semeno-Kojkic c..."
links.text: "Better not to. The Semeno-Kojkic chimera seems like more than I could handle right now."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THAT IS UNDERSTANDABLE. WERE THERE..."
links.text: "THAT IS UNDERSTANDABLE. WERE THERE MORE FORTUNATE TYPES YOU NEEDED TO BE EDUCATED ABOUT?"

links.title: You: ""Enough of C-F.""
links.text: "Enough of C-F."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YES. IT IS CRUEL TO ENTERTAIN OURS..."
links.text: "YES. IT IS CRUEL TO ENTERTAIN OURSELVES WITH THE DEFORMITIES OF C-F. WERE THERE ANY ABLE BODIED RACES YOU NEEDED EDUCATION ON?"

links.title: You: ""Yes, better not to go into it.""
links.text: "Yes, better not to go into it."

links.title: Measurehead: ""IT WOULD BE CRUEL." The man agrees..."
links.text: "IT WOULD BE CRUEL." The man agrees. "TO ENTERTAIN OURSELVES WITH THEIR DEFORMITIES. WERE THERE ANY ABLE BODIED RACES YOU NEEDED EDUCATION ON?"

links.title: You: ""Now that we've been through all th..."
links.text: "Now that we've been through all the types -- do I understand Advanced Race Theory?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU UNDERSTAND *NOTHING*. TO SOLVE..."
links.text: "YOU UNDERSTAND *NOTHING*. TO SOLVE THE GREAT *RACE ENIGMA* YOU HAVE TO FIRST ASK YOURSELF: WHAT *IS* THE RACE ENIGMA? YOU HAVE NOT EVEN WORDED THE MYSTERY, LET ALONE SOLVED IT."

links.title: You: ""Will you let me into the harbour i..."
links.text: "Will you let me into the harbour if I do?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""WE WILL SEE.""
links.text: "WE WILL SEE."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Access to the Union is important f..."
links.text: "Access to the Union is important for our investigation, but there may be another way in... Without becoming a race theoretician."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Am I mildly worried he might take i..."
links.text: Am I mildly worried he might take it *seriously*, the lieutenant thinks. Yes. I am -- he concludes. I *am* worried.

links.title: You: ""How do I word the Mystery?" (Accep..."
links.text: "How do I word the Mystery?" (Accept.)

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU NEED TO *INTERNALIZE* WHAT YOU..."
links.text: "YOU NEED TO *INTERNALIZE* WHAT YOU HAVE HEARD HERE TODAY. THEN RETURN TO ME -- THIS CLARITY DOES NOT COME INSTANTLY."

links.title: You: ""On second thought, I don't have ti..."
links.text: "On second thought, I don't have time to get any deeper into this stuff." (Decline.)

links.title: Measurehead: ""LOST DOE, BUCKLED AWAY AT THE LAST..."
links.text: "LOST DOE, BUCKLED AWAY AT THE LAST GATE -- THIS IS WHY YOUR HAPLOGROUP WILL NEVER RISE FROM THE ASHES. NOW -- I NEED TO LUXURIATE IN THE PRIVATE COMPANY OF MY BABE. LEAVE ME."

links.title: You: ""Let's discuss something else.""
links.text: "Let's discuss something else."

links.title: Measurehead: ""I CANNOT POSSIBLY IMAGINE WHAT ELS..."
links.text: "I CANNOT POSSIBLY IMAGINE WHAT ELSE WE HAVE TO DISCUSS, TYPE B REVACHOLIAN -- YOUR LOVE FOR DISCO MUSIC AND VENEREAL DISEASE?"

links.title: You: "Subscribe to his advanced race theo..."
links.text: Subscribe to his advanced race theory.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Ask what kind of races are there fi..."
links.text: Ask what kind of races are there first. Classification is core to this stuff.

links.title: You: ""Measurehead, I am new to this worl..."
links.text: "Measurehead, I am new to this world. Help me understand its races. I need to know what kind of different races are there?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you?" The lieutenant looks at y..."
links.text: "Do you?" The lieutenant looks at you.

links.title: You: ""I do.""
links.text: "I do."

links.title: You: "(Whisper.) "This is for the... thin..."
links.text: (Whisper.) "This is for the... thing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What thing? We already got *in* th..."
links.text: "What thing? We already got *in* the harbour. You just want to hear about races, don't you?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU ARE OBVIOUSLY A LIBERAL, SEOLI..."
links.text: "YOU ARE OBVIOUSLY A LIBERAL, SEOLITE," the man tells him. "A POLYCULTURALIST. I CAN SEE IT FROM YOUR LOVE OF MICROTECHNOLOGY AND YOUR SARTORIAL CHOICES. DO NOT DENY YOUR FRIEND THE TRUTH YOU HAVE DENIED YOURSELF."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks toward the har..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks toward the harbour's electronic door and then to you. He lets out an audible sigh.

links.title: You: ""On second thought, I don't." (Reli..."
links.text: "On second thought, I don't." (Relinquish the opportunity to learn advanced race theory.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There must be another way to accom..."
links.text: "There must be another way to accomplish police work -- without *racecraft*."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THERE IS NO OTHER WAY TO ACCOMPLIS..."
links.text: "THERE IS NO OTHER WAY TO ACCOMPLISH ANYTHING. RACECRAFT IS THE ONLY WAY."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THERE ARE THREE CATEGORIES OF RACE..."
links.text: "THERE ARE THREE CATEGORIES OF RACE: TYPE A -- THE HEROIC RACES -- TYPE B -- THE SERVILE RACES -- AND THE VILE C-F RACE CAULDRON OF PEDERASTY. WHICH ONE DO YOU NEED EDUCATION ON?"

links.title: You: "I don't want to do that. (Opt out.)"
links.text: I don't want to do that. (Opt out.)

links.title: Conceptualization: "Yes. Better not to expand your mind..."
links.text: Yes. Better not to expand your mind in this direction. You may find out too much about the *mystery*, fly too close to the race sun.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Go ahead, don't be shy. Just ask fo..."
links.text: Go ahead, don't be shy. Just ask for race secrets.

links.title: You: ""I want to learn this race theory o..."
links.text: "I want to learn this race theory of yours. So that we could become... friends?" (Try to smile pathetically.)

links.title: Measurehead: ""DO NOT BE NAIVE. I KNOW THE ANSWER..."
links.text: "DO NOT BE NAIVE. I KNOW THE ANSWER TO THE GREAT RACE ENIGMA. WHY WOULD I SHARE IT WITH A DEFORMED INFANT? YOU DO NOT HAVE THE DEVOTION FOR SERVITUDE."

links.title: You: ""I want to learn this advanced race..."
links.text: "I want to learn this advanced race theory -- to replace my previous race theory. It is *basic*, I'm afraid."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU WILL MAKE DUE WITH YOUR PRIMIT..."
links.text: "YOU WILL MAKE DUE WITH YOUR PRIMITIVE THEORY. I KNOW THE ANSWER TO THE GREAT RACE ENIGMA. WHY WOULD I SHARE IT WITH A DEFORMED INFANT? YOU DO NOT HAVE THE DEVOTION FOR SERVITUDE."

links.title: You: ""I need some of that race-stuff in..."
links.text: "I need some of that race-stuff in my brain. Sock it to me."

links.title: Measurehead: ""INANE POPULAR CULTURE LINGO. IT IS..."
links.text: "INANE POPULAR CULTURE LINGO. IT IS INTELLECTUALLY *UNINTERESTING* TO 'SOCK' ANYTHING TO AN INFANT SUCH AS YOU."

links.title: You: "No, I'll better not say anything on..."
links.text: No, I'll better not say anything on this topic.

links.title: Conceptualization: "That's understandable. Jean-Luc Mea..."
links.text: That's understandable. Jean-Luc Measurehead is a sage and an intellectual giant of race theory. Who are you? Handmaiden of Al Gul.

links.title: You: ""I think I know what the Race Enigm..."
links.text: "I think I know what the Race Enigma is."

links.title: Measurehead: ""AND?""
links.text: "AND?"

links.title: You: ""It's shit. Let me into the fucking..."
links.text: "It's shit. Let me into the fucking harbour."

links.title: Measurehead: ""LOOK, BABE. THE DISCO DANCING DEGE..."
links.text: "LOOK, BABE. THE DISCO DANCING DEGENERATE HAS RUN OUT OF COCAINE TO SHOOT INTO HIS ARMS. THIS HAS MADE HIM SHORT FUSED AND IMPOLITE. UNDERNEATH THE POSTURING, THERE IS DREAD."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Coca has really fucked him over, J..."
links.text: "Coca has really fucked him over, Jean." The woman looks half-bored.

links.title: Measurehead: "He turns to you. "IMPOTENT SUBJECT..."
links.text: He turns to you. "IMPOTENT SUBJECT OF POP CULTURE, I TAKE PITY ON YOU. YOU CLEARLY WANT TO ENTER THE HARBOUR BAD -- LIKE A LITTLE BOY WANTS TO GO ON THE POTTY. I CAN PRESS THE BUTTON FOR YOU -- IT WILL OPEN THE DOOR."

links.title: You: ""That's all I wanted.""
links.text: "That's all I wanted."

links.title: You: ""I don't need your button. I will e..."
links.text: "I don't need your button. I will enter the harbour on my own terms." [Leave.]

links.title: Measurehead: ""LOOK, BABE. THE FOSSILIZED ROCK AN..."
links.text: "LOOK, BABE. THE FOSSILIZED ROCK AND ROLL REBEL CHALLENGES ME -- A FIGURE OF AUTHORITY. HE IS TRYING TO REINSTATE HIS INDIVIDUALISM WITH SWEARWORDS TAKEN FROM ROCK SONGS FROM THE LAST CENTURY."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Individualism has really fucked hi..."
links.text: "Individualism has really fucked him over, Jean." The woman looks half-bored.

links.title: You: ""Paradoxically, you plan to superse..."
links.text: "Paradoxically, you plan to supersede the Occidenals with their own race theory."

links.title: Measurehead: ""LOOK, BABE, THE MINION OF LAW IS A..."
links.text: "LOOK, BABE, THE MINION OF LAW IS ALSO A RACIST. BUT HIS RACISM IS BASIC AND ROTE. HE THINKS HE HAS SOLVED THE GREAT RACE *ENIGMA* BY DESCRIBING A ROTE MECHANISM OF SCIENTIFIC COMPETITION."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""So un-advanced..." The woman looks..."
links.text: "So un-advanced..." The woman looks half-bored.

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE BASIC RACE EDUCATION HE RECEIV..."
links.text: "THE BASIC RACE EDUCATION HE RECEIVED IN HIGH SCHOOL HAS LED HIM TO THINK HIS PHYLUM ARE THE SOLE AUTHORS OF RACE THEORY -- AN ESOTERIC STUDY REACHING BACK TO THE ANCIENT MASS SOCIETY OF PERIKARNASSIS, OVER 4,500 YEARS AGO."

links.title: Measurehead: "He turns to you. "BASIC RACIST, I T..."
links.text: He turns to you. "BASIC RACIST, I TAKE PITY ON YOU. YOU CLEARLY WANT TO ENTER THE HARBOUR BAD. LIKE A LITTLE BOY WHO WANTS TO GO ON THE POTTY. I CAN PRESS THE BUTTON FOR YOU -- IT WILL OPEN THE DOOR."

links.title: You: ""That's all I wanted.""
links.text: "That's all I wanted."

links.title: You: ""I'm not a racist and I don't need..."
links.text: "I'm not a racist and I don't need your help." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""This *racecraft* is what rich peop..."
links.text: "This *racecraft* is what rich people want us to do while they get all the money."

links.title: Measurehead: ""LOOK, BABE. THE RICH-MAN HAS HUMIL..."
links.text: "LOOK, BABE. THE RICH-MAN HAS HUMILIATED AND EMASCULATED THIS *COPLET*. HE CAN ONLY THINK IN BASE MATERIALIST CATEGORIES AND FEMININE ABSTRACTIONS LIKE MONEY."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Rich man really fucked him over, J..."
links.text: "Rich man really fucked him over, Jean." The woman looks half-bored.

links.title: Measurehead: ""HIS RAGE IS ALREADY PLAYED OUT ON..."
links.text: "HIS RAGE IS ALREADY PLAYED OUT ON THE STAGE OF HISTORY -- AS THE GROTESQUE TRAGEDY OF REVOLUTION. ALL IT CAN ACCOMPLISH NOW IS IMPOTENT ACADEMIC TEXT AND NEUROSYPHILITIC ROCK AND ROLL MELANCHOLIA."

links.title: Measurehead: "He turns to you. "YOU COULD HAVE US..."
links.text: He turns to you. "YOU COULD HAVE USED THIS OPPORTUNITY TO OVERCOME YOUR NARROW, *AL GUL* RAVAGED IDENTITY. INSTEAD OF UNLOCKING THE RACE ENIGMA, YOU ATTEMPTED TO *ADD* TO IT -- UNSUCCESSFULLY."

links.title: Measurehead: ""TAKE SOLACE FROM THE FACT THAT THE..."
links.text: "TAKE SOLACE FROM THE FACT THAT THESE THOUGHTS..." He points to your head. "WILL *NEVER* ENTIRELY LEAVE YOUR BRAIN. THEY WILL BE WITH YOU ON THE DAY YOU DIE -- THE ONLY GERM OF HEROISM IN YOUR BODY. NOW GO, I HAVE BEAUTY AND TRUTH TO DISCUSS WITH MY WOMAN."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Damn, Jean, how are you so romanti..."
links.text: "Damn, Jean, how are you so romantic..." the woman swoons.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Was there an out of this for you wi..."
links.text: Was there an out of this for you with success. Or was the rhetoric game rigged? I can't tell...

links.title: Measurehead: "He turns to you. "IMPOTENT CLASS WA..."
links.text: He turns to you. "IMPOTENT CLASS WARRIOR, I TAKE PITY ON YOU. YOU CLEARLY WANT TO ENTER THE HARBOUR BAD. LIKE A LITTLE BOY WHO WANTS TO GO ON THE POTTY. I CAN PRESS THE BUTTON FOR YOU -- IT WILL OPEN THE DOOR."

links.title: You: ""That's all I wanted.""
links.text: "That's all I wanted."

links.title: You: ""I don't need your pity. The workin..."
links.text: "I don't need your pity. The working class will rise in a sea of blood and you and your rich-boy master will drown in it." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""It's just something you shock peop..."
links.text: "It's just something you shock people with. Liberal and progressives people."

links.title: Measurehead: ""LOOK BABE, THE PETULANT ROCK AND R..."
links.text: "LOOK BABE, THE PETULANT ROCK AND ROLL REBEL THINKS THE RACIAL SYNTHESIS EXISTS TO *RANKLE* HIS SENSIBILITIES. IN HIS HALL-OF-MIRRORS EXISTENCE, EVERYTHING IS INSINCERE -- EVEN NATURE."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""I knew he wouldn't get it, Jean."..."
links.text: "I knew he wouldn't get it, Jean." The woman looks half-bored. "He's like a cop or something."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU THINK HE IS AN OLD MAN, BUT IN..."
links.text: "YOU THINK HE IS AN OLD MAN, BUT INSIDE HE IS A TEENAGER, WHO ONLY SEES HIMSELF IN THE MIRROR. *TRUTH* IS STANDING IN THE EYES OF HIS LIBERAL CLIQUE, *ORGANISM* IS A SPECTACLE FOR THE *RRC RADIO 1 MORNING SHOW*."

links.title: Measurehead: "He turns to you. "DEGENERATE SOCIAL..."
links.text: He turns to you. "DEGENERATE SOCIAL DEMOCRAT, I TAKE PITY ON YOU. YOU CLEARLY WANT TO ENTER THE HARBOUR BAD. LIKE A LITTLE BOY WHO WANTS TO GO ON THE POTTY. I CAN PRESS THE BUTTON FOR YOU -- IT WILL OPEN THE DOOR."

links.title: You: ""That's all I wanted.""
links.text: "That's all I wanted."

links.title: You: ""I don't need your pity. And you mi..."
links.text: "I don't need your pity. And you misunderstood me, I'm not a liberal, I just... am I a liberal?" [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""It's whatever you want it to be. I..."
links.text: "It's whatever you want it to be. It's a free association language exercise: degenerate, race hero..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""LOOK BABE, WHEN CONFRONTED WITH TH..."
links.text: "LOOK BABE, WHEN CONFRONTED WITH THE HARSH TRUTH OF HIS DEMISE THE MELANCHOLIC ACADEMICIAN STARTS FIDDLING HIS OWN GENITALIA. HIS BALD SPOT BETRAYS THAT HE IS A COMPULSIVE MASTURBATOR."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""That's disgusting, Jean." The woma..."
links.text: "That's disgusting, Jean." The woman's young face crumples up in displeasure.

links.title: Measurehead: ""IT IS. BENEATH THE VENEER OF ACADE..."
links.text: "IT IS. BENEATH THE VENEER OF ACADEMIC JARGON THE LIBERAL THEORIST IS A BEAST, A SEXUAL MANIAC AND A DEPRAVED NIHILIST. LIFE IS A *GAME* TO HIM. WORDS ARE MEANINGLESS. NO ONE IS ACCOUNTABLE FOR ANYTHING."

links.title: Measurehead: "He turns to you. "NIHILISTIC SEX MA..."
links.text: He turns to you. "NIHILISTIC SEX MANIAC, I TAKE PITY ON YOUR URGES. YOU CLEARLY WANT TO ENTER THE HARBOUR *BAD,* LIKE A LITTLE BOY WHO WANTS TO GO ON THE POTTY. I CAN PRESS THE BUTTON FOR YOU -- IT WILL OPEN THE DOOR."

links.title: You: ""That's all I wanted.""
links.text: "That's all I wanted."

links.title: You: ""I'm not a depraved maniac, I was j..."
links.text: "I'm not a depraved maniac, I was just making an observation. Forget it, I will get into the harbour some other way." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""It's about you being conflicted ab..."
links.text: "It's about you being conflicted about your *Kojka* girlfriend, isn't it?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""LOOK, BABE, WHEN CONFRONTED WITH T..."
links.text: "LOOK, BABE, WHEN CONFRONTED WITH THE DEMISE OF HIS ENTIRE RACE, THE BOURGEOIS ALCOHOLIC DEGENERATE FOCUSES ON GOSSIP. OTHER PEOPLE'S LIVES ARE A REFUGE FOR HIM -- FROM THE BURNING RACE WRECKAGE OF HIS OWN."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""That's just tactless, Jean." The w..."
links.text: "That's just tactless, Jean." The woman doesn't even look at you.

links.title: Measurehead: "He turns to you. "EFFEMINATE GOSSIP..."
links.text: He turns to you. "EFFEMINATE GOSSIP-MONGERER, I TAKE PITY ON YOUR TABLOID DRIVEN URGES. YOU CLEARLY WANT TO ENTER THE HARBOUR *BAD*, LIKE A LITTLE BOY WHO WANTS TO GO ON THE POTTY. I CAN PRESS THE BUTTON FOR YOU -- IT WILL OPEN THE DOOR."

links.title: You: ""That's all I wanted.""
links.text: "That's all I wanted."

links.title: Measurehead: ""VERY WELL. YOU MAY ENTER THE DOOR..."
links.text: "VERY WELL. YOU MAY ENTER THE DOOR *ONCE*." He punches the emergency button with his fist. "OUR RACE CONVERSATION HERE HAS CONCLUDED."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Finally." The lieutenant impatient..."
links.text: "Finally." The lieutenant impatiently gestures toward the door. "Let's go."

links.title: You: ""Yes, yes, keep hiding your insecur..."
links.text: "Yes, yes, keep hiding your insecurities. Whatever, I'll find another way into the harbour." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""I don't know about the rest, but i..."
links.text: "I don't know about the rest, but it's clear I should stop drinking the ancient Iilmaraan mind poison Al Gul."

links.title: Measurehead: ""FASCINATING..." The phrenologic li..."
links.text: "FASCINATING..." The phrenologic lines on his face move like a puzzle board: "THE REVACHOLIAN DEGENERATE SHOWS SIGNS OF RACIAL SELF REFLECTION. HOW DID YOU ACCOMPLISH THIS LITTLE FEAT?"

links.title: You: ""I sobered up for five minutes.""
links.text: "I sobered up for five minutes."

links.title: Measurehead: ""SO IT WOULD SEEM, THRALL OF GUL. O..."
links.text: "SO IT WOULD SEEM, THRALL OF GUL. ON ONE HAND, THIS PATHETIC SELF-THERAPY HAS LITTLE TO DO WITH THE GREAT MYSTERY OF LIVING ORGANISMS, THE RACE ENIGMA..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""AND, OF COURSE, YOU WILL NOT BE AB..."
links.text: "AND, OF COURSE, YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO FREE YOURSELF FROM THE YOKE OF *GUL*. IT IS TOO LATE. IT MAY BE LETHAL TO STOP AT THIS POINT, BUT STILL..." He pauses in heroic doubt.

links.title: Volition: "Your willpower fires up. Directing..."
links.text: Your willpower fires up. Directing you to speak...

links.title: Measurehead: ""IF THE REVACHOLIAN DEGENERATE IS C..."
links.text: "IF THE REVACHOLIAN DEGENERATE IS CAPABLE OF CRITICAL THOUGHT HE MAY PROVE A *RACE ADVERSARY* YET -- WAS I MISTAKEN TO SHARE THE ESOTERIC SCIENCE WITH HIM?"

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Jean, baby -- you did the heroic t..."
links.text: "Jean, baby -- you did the heroic thing."

links.title: You: ""I *will* stop drinking.""
links.text: "I *will* stop drinking."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THAT IS NOT POSSIBLE. THE GAME OF..."
links.text: "THAT IS NOT POSSIBLE. THE GAME OF *SHAH-MAT* YOU PLAY AGAINST THE GUL'S TRICKS IS UNWINNABLE. THE DAYS, THE WEEKS, THE MONTHS WILL WEAR YOU OUT. THE OCCIDENTAL HAPLOGROUP IS INCAPABLE OF LONG TERM LUCID THOUGHT."

links.title: Volition: "NO."
links.text: NO.

links.title: You: ""You're wrong. I'll do it. I'm quit..."
links.text: "You're wrong. I'll do it. I'm quitting!"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU WILL NOT. YOU CANNOT WITHSTAND..."
links.text: "YOU WILL NOT. YOU CANNOT WITHSTAND THE WASTE LAND OF REALITY."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""It's super hard Jean." The woman l..."
links.text: "It's super hard Jean." The woman looks at her fingernails. "My mom couldn't do it either."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go, officer." The lieutenant..."
links.text: "Let's go, officer." The lieutenant puts his hand on your shoulder. "Let's go do some work."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU WILL NOT. YOU CANNOT WITHSTAND..."
links.text: "YOU WILL NOT. YOU CANNOT WITHSTAND THE WASTE LAND OF REALITY."

links.title: You: ""You're right. Who am I kidding. Wi..."
links.text: "You're right. Who am I kidding. Without party time, grey reality is devoid of reason."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THAT IS RIGHT. YOU CANNOT WITHSTAN..."
links.text: "THAT IS RIGHT. YOU CANNOT WITHSTAND THE WASTE LAND OF REALITY."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Perhaps we should go and do some w..."
links.text: "Perhaps we should go and do some work now?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""THAT IS RIGHT. YOU CANNOT WITHSTAN..."
links.text: "THAT IS RIGHT. YOU CANNOT WITHSTAND THE WASTE LAND OF REALITY."

links.title: Measurehead: ""SO IT WOULD SEEM, THRALL OF GUL --..."
links.text: "SO IT WOULD SEEM, THRALL OF GUL -- I FIND MYSELF AT A CROSSROADS. ON ONE HAND, THIS PATHETIC SELF-THERAPY HAS LITTLE TO DO WITH THE GREAT MYSTERY OF LIVING ORGANISMS, THE RACE ENIGMA..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""AND, OF COURSE, YOU WILL NOT BE AB..."
links.text: "AND, OF COURSE, YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO FREE YOURSELF FROM THE YOKE OF *GUL*. IT IS TOO LATE. IT MAY BE LETHAL TO STOP AT THIS POINT, BUT STILL..." He pauses in heroic doubt.

links.title: Volition: "Your willpower fires up. Directing..."
links.text: Your willpower fires up. Directing you to speak...

links.title: Measurehead: ""IF THE REVACHOLIAN DEGENERATE IS C..."
links.text: "IF THE REVACHOLIAN DEGENERATE IS CAPABLE OF CRITICAL THOUGHT HE MAY STILL PROVE A *RACE ADVERSARY* -- WHY SHOULD I HELP MY ADVERSARY?" He looks at the red button, seeking council from his own ideals.

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Jean baby -- do the heroic thing.""
links.text: "Jean baby -- do the heroic thing."

links.title: You: ""First of all, I *will* stop drinki..."
links.text: "First of all, I *will* stop drinking."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THAT IS NOT POSSIBLE. THE GAME OF..."
links.text: "THAT IS NOT POSSIBLE. THE GAME OF *SHAH-MAT* YOU PLAY AGAINST THE GUL'S TRICKS IS UNWINNABLE. THE DAYS, THE WEEKS, THE MONTHS WILL WEAR YOU OUT. THE OCCIDENTAL HAPLOGROUP IS INCAPABLE OF LONG TERM LUCID THOUGHT."

links.title: Volition: "NO."
links.text: NO.

links.title: You: ""You're wrong. I'll do it. I'm quit..."
links.text: "You're wrong. I'll do it. I'm quitting!"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU WILL NOT. YOU CANNOT WITHSTAND..."
links.text: "YOU WILL NOT. YOU CANNOT WITHSTAND THE WASTE LAND OF REALITY."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""It's super hard, Jean." The woman..."
links.text: "It's super hard, Jean." The woman looks at her fingernails. "My mom couldn't do it either."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU WILL NOT. YOU CANNOT WITHSTAND..."
links.text: "YOU WILL NOT. YOU CANNOT WITHSTAND THE WASTE LAND OF REALITY."

links.title: You: ""Now open the doors, I need to talk..."
links.text: "Now open the doors, I need to talk to your boss."

links.title: Measurehead: ""VERY WELL, YOU MAY ENTER *ONCE*."..."
links.text: "VERY WELL, YOU MAY ENTER *ONCE*." He punches the emergency button with his fist. "OUR CONVERSATION HERE HAS CONCLUDED."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well done." The lieutenant impatie..."
links.text: "Well done." The lieutenant impatiently gestures toward the door. "Let's go."

links.title: You: ""I imagined the pyknic face of the..."
links.text: "I imagined the pyknic face of the desert pygmee laughing at me, crooked teeth grinning."

links.title: You: ""I imagined a woman, laughing at me..."
links.text: "I imagined a woman, laughing at me beneath her pity. Terrible and beautiful."

links.title: You: ""It's always been 100% clear to me..."
links.text: "It's always been 100% clear to me that the answer to the race enigma is: I should stop drinking."

links.title: You: ""This dump is ready to be supersede..."
links.text: "This dump is ready to be superseded by the Areopagite superstate. I can serve as a clerk in your administration -- maybe you need a cop."

links.title: Measurehead: ""EVERYONE CAN SEE THAT. IT HAS LITT..."
links.text: "EVERYONE CAN SEE THAT. IT HAS LITTLE TO DO WITH THE *RACE ENIGMA*."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Baby, don't be mean," The woman pl..."
links.text: "Baby, don't be mean," The woman pleads with Measurehead. "Give him another chance."

links.title: Measurehead: ""ANYTHING FOR YOU, BABE." He looks..."
links.text: "ANYTHING FOR YOU, BABE." He looks to a space right above your head and gestures you to speak.

links.title: You: "Try again, punch his lights out wit..."
links.text: Try again, punch his lights out with a right hook!

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Just like that, instinct took over..."
links.text: Just like that, instinct took over -- a solid strike straight into his throat, into the cartilage! You could swear you felt the soft palate break...

links.title: Measurehead: "The man is reeling, gasping for air..."
links.text: The man is reeling, gasping for air, time stands still around you. In the distance the sounds of the harbour are falling silent.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "All you hear is a small gurgling so..."
links.text: All you hear is a small gurgling sound as a trickle of blood appears on the man's lip.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Now's the time for a SPIN KICK! He..."
links.text: Now's the time for a SPIN KICK! He expects the one-two, not the one-three-sixty!

links.title: Half Light: "No, don't be a fucking ballerina, r..."
links.text: No, don't be a fucking ballerina, rip into him, right hook! Get *intimate* with him... bring the hurt closer!

links.title: Half Light: "He's open, rip into him. Right hook..."
links.text: He's open, rip into him. Right hook. Escalate it, get *intimate* with him... bring the hurt closer!

links.title: You: "Wait-wait, what should I do?"
links.text: Wait-wait, what should I do?

links.title: Measurehead: "Don't wait. You've only got a milli..."
links.text: Don't wait. You've only got a millisecond -- he's coming to, time is breaking loose from the stupor, his left hand curls up into a fist...

links.title: Composure: "That fighting pose -- watch out, he..."
links.text: That fighting pose -- watch out, he's *expecting* the hook!

links.title: You: "(Rip into him with a right hook.)"
links.text: (Rip into him with a right hook.)

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Oh god, wrong move! Your head is in..."
links.text: Oh god, wrong move! Your head is in his hands, like a pair of forceps crushing you and you can feel every joule...

links.title: Measurehead: ""SAY IT: 'I AM A DEGENERATE DRUNK.'""
links.text: "SAY IT: 'I AM A DEGENERATE DRUNK.'"

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Not again... take the pain, god dam..."
links.text: Not again... take the pain, god damn it, at least take that!

links.title: You: "How did this happen?! I was winning..."
links.text: How did this happen?! I was winning?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You were. But then you made a wrong..."
links.text: You were. But then you made a wrong move. And now your skull feels like it's about to crack.

links.title: You: ""I.... am a degener... degener... d..."
links.text: "I.... am a degener... degener... degenerate drunk!"

links.title: You: ""Never.""
links.text: "Never."

links.title: You: ""Assault of a police officer! Help!""
links.text: "Assault of a police officer! Help!"

links.title: You: "(Try to somehow wiggle yourself loo..."
links.text: (Try to somehow wiggle yourself loose from his grasp.)

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Take the pain, god damn it, at leas..."
links.text: Take the pain, god damn it, at least take that!

links.title: You: "(Back up and perform a 360° flying..."
links.text: (Back up and perform a 360° flying spin-kick.)

links.title: Measurehead: "The man lands with a dull thump, li..."
links.text: The man lands with a dull thump, like a broken down puppet of muscles and sinew. For a moment he still tries to keep his head up, dazed eyes looking at you with unimaginable surprise.... To your left is *The Button.*

links.title: You: ""Welcome to Revachol!!""
links.text: "Welcome to Revachol!!"

links.title: Measurehead: "As you slam your fist on the button..."
links.text: As you slam your fist on the button the man collapses entirely, his head rolling to the side...

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Looks like you're the new Measureh..."
links.text: "Looks like you're the new Measurehead now."

links.title: Suggestion: "Her voice is surprisingly calm."
links.text: Her voice is surprisingly calm.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No one is the new Measurehead -- l..."
links.text: "No one is the new Measurehead -- let's go. Before he gets up..." The lieutenant makes haste toward the door.

links.title: You: ""Yes, that's right. I am the new Me..."
links.text: "Yes, that's right. I am the new Measurehead now." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""No, I just want to get into the ha..."
links.text: "No, I just want to get into the harbour so I can do my job." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""Disco inferno!" (Press the button...."
links.text: "Disco inferno!" (Press the button.)

links.title: You: ""Welcome to Revachol!!""
links.text: "Welcome to Revachol!!"

links.title: You: ""The end has begun -- I am the lion..."
links.text: "The end has begun -- I am the lion-headed cavalry." (Press the button.)

links.title: You: ""I'm so sorry, I didn't want to do..."
links.text: "I'm so sorry, I didn't want to do this." (Press the button.)

links.title: You: "(Just press the button.)"
links.text: (Just press the button.)

links.title: Physical Instrument: "It has happened *again*! The titan..."
links.text: It has happened *again*! The titan has your fist locked in his hand and he's twisting it...

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU MUST BE OUT OF YOUR MIND, DEGE..."
links.text: "YOU MUST BE OUT OF YOUR MIND, DEGENERATE DRUNK." The pressure on your hand becomes unbearable. "SAY IT: *I AM A DEGENERATE ALCOHOLIC*."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "The crackle of bones, inside... you..."
links.text: The crackle of bones, inside... you can hear it.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Don't say it. You're not a degenera..."
links.text: Don't say it. You're not a degenerate alcoholic, you're a cop and a hero.

links.title: You: ""I... am... a... a degenerate al......"
links.text: "I... am... a... a degenerate al... alcoholic."

links.title: Measurehead: ""GOOD." He releases your small hand..."
links.text: "GOOD." He releases your small hand. "NOW GO. BEFORE YOU ENTER CARDIAC ARREST."

links.title: Measurehead: ""GOOD." He releases your hand. "NOW..."
links.text: "GOOD." He releases your hand. "NOW LEAVE, BEFORE YOU HUMILIATE YOUR HOMO-EROTIC ORGANISATION ANY FURTHER."

links.title: You: ""F... d... dfuck you!""
links.text: "F... d... dfuck you!"

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Your hand cracks and twists in his..."
links.text: Your hand cracks and twists in his grasp but your body is too numb with adrenaline to feel it...

links.title: Inland Empire: "He can't hurt you. What more can he..."
links.text: He can't hurt you. What more can he do that you haven't gone through already?

links.title: You: ""I... I... I am a violent drunk...""
links.text: "I... I... I am a violent drunk..."

links.title: You: ""No. I... won't fucking say anythin..."
links.text: "No. I... won't fucking say anything."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Your hand twists in his grip and th..."
links.text: Your hand twists in his grip and the pain blinds you. Still you press the words out of your swollen mouth...

links.title: You: ""I... am... the law.""
links.text: "I... am... the law."

links.title: You: ""I am invincible. It doesn't hurt...""
links.text: "I am invincible. It doesn't hurt..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""RABID ANIMAL, YOU SHOULD BE PUT DO..."
links.text: "RABID ANIMAL, YOU SHOULD BE PUT DOWN." He releases your poor hand from his grasp. "I WILL NOT BE THE ONE WHO GETS YOUR STINK ON ME."

links.title: You: ""There's nothing you can do to me....."
links.text: "There's nothing you can do to me... that *treacherous whores* haven't done to me already."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Your fist cracks in his hand like a..."
links.text: Your fist cracks in his hand like a ripe apple. Pain shoots up into your brain as he's twisting it more and more:

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE WORDS TO THE SONG HAVE CHANGED..."
links.text: "THE WORDS TO THE SONG HAVE CHANGED. SAY: 'I AM A VIOLENT DRUNK.'"

links.title: You: ""I'm a... cop.""
links.text: "I'm a... cop."

links.title: You: ""Help!""
links.text: "Help!"

links.title: Physical Instrument: "How did this happen? Your little fi..."
links.text: How did this happen? Your little fist is in his giant hand and he's squeezing it. It hurts...

links.title: You: "Knock him out."
links.text: Knock him out.

links.title: You: "Get him to talk to you in private."
links.text: Get him to talk to you in private.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Even under the increased force on y..."
