links.text: Even under the increased force on your skull there is no pain... just the sound of your own blood gushing in there, feeding your mind with oxygen.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "The compression is unbearable. This..."
links.text: The compression is unbearable. This is causing some serious damage to whatever precious, gelatinous thing is inside there... your sight turns red.

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU DOMINATED LESSER CULTURES -- L..."
links.text: "YOU DOMINATED LESSER CULTURES -- LIKE THE DEFORMED HIMEANS AND THE INEXPLICABLY POTATO-OBSESSED KOJKOS -- BUT NOW YOUR ASCENT TO THE GENETIC SUMMIT HAS HALTED. YOU ARE OBSESSED WITH SADNESS AND WITH FRIVOLOUS POP CULTURE."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU WILL BE SUPERSEDED -- ISN'T TH..."
links.text: "YOU WILL BE SUPERSEDED -- ISN'T THAT RIGHT, BABE?"

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""It is, baby, yeah. You know it!""
links.text: "It is, baby, yeah. You know it!"

links.title: Interfacing: "There is a button right behind him,..."
links.text: There is a button right behind him, just out of reach... it must be the one that opens the door to the harbour.

links.title: Suggestion: "This man is not budging. Let's hope..."
links.text: This man is not budging. Let's hope his superiors inside are more cooperative.

links.title: You: ""Let's go, I'm ready to talk in pri..."
links.text: "Let's go, I'm ready to talk in private." (Go to mom's office with him.)

links.title: Measurehead: ""THIS WAY, PROCESSED MEAT MAN." He..."
links.text: "THIS WAY, PROCESSED MEAT MAN." He points to the office door behind you.

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""We're gonna miss you, Jean!" The b..."
links.text: "We're gonna miss you, Jean!" The babes swoon and sigh as if he's about to leave on an interisolary flight.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods, ready to spend..."
links.text: The lieutenant nods, ready to spend some time on his own.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "He couldn't be happier to get out o..."
links.text: He couldn't be happier to get out of this conversation.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You go ahead and have your talk,"..."
links.text: "You go ahead and have your talk," says the lieutenant, glancing over the railing. "I need a few things from Frittte anyways. We'll catch up later."

links.title: Measurehead: ""DON'T WORRY, BABE. THIS WON'T TAKE..."
links.text: "DON'T WORRY, BABE. THIS WON'T TAKE LONG."

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Please, stop doing this. You're ma..."
links.text: "Please, stop doing this. You're making us look bad."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We still need to get into the harb..."
links.text: "We still need to get into the harbour. We need help with the tree situation. There must be another way..." His gaze wanders over the Whirling's roof to the yard.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Try the jump? Up there, on the roof..."
links.text: Try the jump? Up there, on the roof! It'll be worth it. Else there is little choice but to figure out a way to deal with the man...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We still need to get into the harb..."
links.text: "We still need to get into the harbour. There is an interview to conduct. There must be another way..." His gaze wanders over the Whirling's roof to the yard.

dialogueTree.title: Measurehead: ""YOUR RACE DESCENT HAS ONLY *WORSEN..."
dialogueTree.text: "YOUR RACE DESCENT HAS ONLY *WORSENED* SINCE I LAST SAW YOU -- YOU HAVE REALLY LET YOURSELF GO."

dialogueTree.title: Measurehead: ""LAST WE SAW, YOUR RACE WAS BEING S..."
dialogueTree.text: "LAST WE SAW, YOUR RACE WAS BEING SUPERSEDED BY THE SEMENESE."

links.title: You: ""Come on, I just need you to move a..."
links.text: "Come on, I just need you to move about twenty centimetres back."

links.title: Measurehead: ""IT IS MY TASK TO KEEP THE DEGENERA..."
links.text: "IT IS MY TASK TO KEEP THE DEGENERATE DRUNKS FROM ENTERING THE HARBOUR."

links.title: You: "Push him out of the way."
links.text: Push him out of the way.

links.title: Measurehead: ""THAT IS RIGHT." He doesn't even fl..."
links.text: "THAT IS RIGHT." He doesn't even flinch. "YOU SHOULD LEAVE THE STAGE OF HISTORY WITH DIGNITY -- BY INVITING THE OTHER RACES TO A *GREAT WORLD WAR*."

links.title: Measurehead: ""BRING YOUR TROOPS TO THE SEMENINE..."
links.text: "BRING YOUR TROOPS TO THE SEMENINE ISLANDS AND TO BOOGIE STREET AND WE WILL PULVERIZE YOU. WHEN YOU ARE GONE WE WILL BUILD A MUSEUM FOR YOU."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE WALLS WILL BE LINED WITH BOTTL..."
links.text: "THE WALLS WILL BE LINED WITH BOTTLES OF *AL GUL* -- YOUR BELOVED BEVERAGE. INSIDE WE WILL STORE THE ODES TO HOMO-SEXUALITY YOU CALL ART AND YOUR MICROCEPHALIC SKULLS."

links.title: Rhetoric: "You could *internalize* Measurehead..."
links.text: You could *internalize* Measurehead's race theory. It would *enrich* you rhetorically.

links.title: You: "Right. Good idea."
links.text: Right. Good idea.

links.title: Rhetoric: "The *best* idea."
links.text: The *best* idea.

links.title: You: "Wouldn't that mean I have to become..."
links.text: Wouldn't that mean I have to become a Semenese supremacist myself?

links.title: Rhetoric: "Well, not as such. What you do with..."
links.text: Well, not as such. What you do with a mastery of advanced race theory is up to you. You could reject the findings, sure -- or accept them and become an *advanced* racist.

links.title: You: "But I already subscribe to one race..."
links.text: But I already subscribe to one race theory, won't they conflict each other?

links.title: Rhetoric: "The *down with racism* thing? That'..."
links.text: The *down with racism* thing? That's basic race theory. This is way above that. *Way*.

links.title: You: "I like the punching idea more."
links.text: I like the punching idea more.

links.title: Half Light: "Do it! Now!"
links.text: Do it! Now!

links.title: Suggestion: "No... don't 'rip into' anyone. You'..."
links.text: No... don't 'rip into' anyone. You're sensitive, remember? Communicate.

links.title: Endurance: "Bröther... this one might know how..."
links.text: Bröther... this one might know how to turn back time.

links.title: Half Light: "This is your chance, he's talking....."
links.text: This is your chance, he's talking... rip into him with a punch and catch him off guard.

links.title: Rhetoric: "No, there's a peaceful solution. Yo..."
links.text: No, there's a peaceful solution. You could *internalize* Measurehead's race theory. He would take you as one of his own.

links.title: Rhetoric: "There may be a peaceful solution to..."
links.text: There may be a peaceful solution to this. You could *internalize* Measurehead's race theory. He would take you as one of his own.

links.title: You: ""You're right about all this. Now I..."
links.text: "You're right about all this. Now I just need you to let me go into the harbour."

links.title: Measurehead: ""ENOUGH WITH THIS BEGGING. YOU SHOU..."
links.text: "ENOUGH WITH THIS BEGGING. YOU SHOULD LEAVE THE STAGE OF HISTORY WITH DIGNITY -- BY INVITING THE OTHER RACES TO A *GREAT WORLD WAR*."

links.title: You: ""The situation is serious. Your peo..."
links.text: "The situation is serious. Your people have probably killed a man. I need to talk to your boss."

links.title: You: ""This is going nowhere." [Leave.]"
links.text: "This is going nowhere." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Measurehead: ""YOUR BODY CONTINUES TO BETRAY YOUR..."
dialogueTree.text: "YOUR BODY CONTINUES TO BETRAY YOUR DEGENERACY."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Yeah, Measurehead, his body totall..."
links.text: "Yeah, Measurehead, his body totally betrays his degeneracy," the young woman at the giant's side agrees.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Your body does *not* betray your de..."
links.text: Your body does *not* betray your degeneracy, that's a lie. You're in great shape.

links.title: Authority: "Don't say anything, size him up fir..."
links.text: Don't say anything, size him up first.

links.title: You: "Say nothing, size him up first."
links.text: Say nothing, size him up first.

links.title: Measurehead: ""ARE YOU ADMIRING MY MORPHOPHYSIOLO..."
links.text: "ARE YOU ADMIRING MY MORPHOPHYSIOLOGY?" A ripple of muscle passes underneath his skin. He lets you look.

links.title: Measurehead: ""IT MUST BE FRIGHTENING TO STAND IN..."
links.text: "IT MUST BE FRIGHTENING TO STAND IN THE SHADOW OF THIS *RACIAL PINNACLE*. BE CALM, HAM SANDWICH. YOU ARE NOT IN DANGER, BECAUSE YOU ARE NOT A THREAT TO ME."

links.title: You: "Puff out your chest, still say noth..."
links.text: Puff out your chest, still say nothing.

links.title: Measurehead: ""WHAT IS THIS *ANDROGYNOUS* DISPLAY..."
links.text: "WHAT IS THIS *ANDROGYNOUS* DISPLAY OF SEXUAL MATURITY?" He looks down at you, taking stock of your physique.

links.title: Endurance: "Things are not as bad as they look...."
links.text: Things are not as bad as they look. Sure, you have high blood pressure from metabolizing heroic quantities of ethanol. But you are robustly built. You will survive.

links.title: Measurehead: ""I CAN SEE YOU WERE ONCE AN ATHLETE..."
links.text: "I CAN SEE YOU WERE ONCE AN ATHLETE. THEN DETERIORATED IN YOUR TWENTIES. IT IS TYPICAL OF YOUR HAPLOGROUP. LET'S BLAME THE FAILED EDUCATION SYSTEM AND LENIENCY TOWARD DEGENERATES IN YOUR HOMELAND."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Jean-Luc, his body is betraying hi..."
links.text: "Jean-Luc, his body is betraying his degeneracy pretty hard..." She holds her nose. "Maybe you can ask him to leave?"

links.title: Endurance: "You hear your heart pumping, fast a..."
links.text: You hear your heart pumping, fast and irregular. Your joints ache and you feel old... but still alive, somehow.

links.title: Measurehead: ""STOP IT. YOU ARE EMBARRASSING YOUR..."
links.text: "STOP IT. YOU ARE EMBARRASSING YOURSELF IN FRONT OF THIS WOMAN, AND YOUR PAEDOMORPHIC FRIEND."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Khm...""
Measurehead: ""STOP IT. YOU ARE EMBARRASSING YOUR..."
links.text: "STOP IT. YOU ARE EMBARRASSING YOURSELF IN FRONT OF THIS WOMAN."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THIS DISPLAY OF WEAKNESS MAY APPEA..."
links.text: "THIS DISPLAY OF WEAKNESS MAY APPEAL TO OLDER WOMEN, WITH A STRONGER MATERNAL INSTINCT -- BUT IT IS A LIABILITY, HERE ON *BATTLEFIELD MARTINAISE*."

links.title: Endurance: "Merely standing up makes you sweat..."
links.text: Merely standing up makes you sweat profusely. Your breathing is erratic. Your own heartbeat in your ears grows frantic and you feel your blood pressure rise.

links.title: You: ""What do you mean, my body betrays..."
links.text: "What do you mean, my body betrays my degeneracy?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU HAVE SUCCUMBED TO *AL GUL*." H..."
links.text: "YOU HAVE SUCCUMBED TO *AL GUL*." His face contorts in disgust -- as if he were smelling a dead rat.

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU REEK OF IT. AN INVISIBLE SWORD..."
links.text: "YOU REEK OF IT. AN INVISIBLE SWORD OF *AL GUL* EMERGES FROM YOUR THROAT. YOU CANNOT SEE IT, BUT OTHERS CAN. IT IS MAKING THE WOMAN IN MY COMPANY SICK."

links.title: You: ""Wait, uhm... *Al Gul*?""
links.text: "Wait, uhm... *Al Gul*?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YES -- *AL GUL*."
links.text: "YES -- *AL GUL*.

links.title: Logic: "He means *alcohol*."
links.text: He means *alcohol*.

links.title: You: ""But what *is* Al Gul?""
links.text: "But what *is* Al Gul?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""CORRECT, MY SMALL-SKULLED SERVANT...."
links.text: "CORRECT, MY SMALL-SKULLED SERVANT." He nods approvingly.

links.title: Measurehead: ""AL GUL IS AN ANCIENT IILMARAAN POI..."
links.text: "AL GUL IS AN ANCIENT IILMARAAN POISON, A PARASITIC FUNGUS THAT HAS COLONIZED YOUR RACE. IT IS A TRICK THE DESERT PYGMEES PLAYED ON YOU -- FOR HUMILIATING THEM AND STRIPPING THEM OF THEIR LAND."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Intentionally fermented drinks have..."
links.text: Intentionally fermented drinks have existed for ten thousand years...

links.title: You: ""The Iilmaraan people did not inven..."
links.text: "The Iilmaraan people did not invent alcohol. It's existed since the neolithic."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THIS IS A FABRICATION THE AL-CHEMI..."
links.text: "THIS IS A FABRICATION THE AL-CHEMISTS OF YEESUT AND BASHIR AND THEIR GOLEM, AL GUL, HAVE FED YOUR PEOPLE. GO ON BELIEVING IN IT, *RACE LOSER*."

links.title: You: ""I don't think that's how history w..."
links.text: "I don't think that's how history works."

links.title: Measurehead: ""WHY DON'T YOU HAVE ANOTHER DRINK?..."
links.text: "WHY DON'T YOU HAVE ANOTHER DRINK? YOUR FEATURES ARE NOT YET CONGENITALLY DEFORMED ENOUGH."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Oh yeah, Measurehead..." The babe..."
links.text: "Oh yeah, Measurehead..." The babe looks at him with eyes full of admiration that transcends the merely sexual.

links.title: Suggestion: "This is going well for Measurehead."
links.text: This is going well for Measurehead.

links.title: You: ""That's probably right, yes.""
links.text: "That's probably right, yes."

links.title: Measurehead: ""GOOD, THERE IS A *FRITTTE* NEARBY...."
links.text: "GOOD, THERE IS A *FRITTTE* NEARBY. CONGRATULATE YOURSELF WITH ANOTHER DRINK. YOUR FEATURES ARE NOT YET CONGENITALLY DEFORMED ENOUGH."

links.title: You: ""You mean alcohol?""
links.text: "You mean alcohol?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""CORRECT, MY SMALL-SKULLED SERVANT...."
links.text: "CORRECT, MY SMALL-SKULLED SERVANT." He nods approvingly.

links.title: You: ""This explains everything.""
links.text: "This explains everything."

links.title: Measurehead: ""SERVITUDE TO AL GUL DOES NOT EXPLA..."
links.text: "SERVITUDE TO AL GUL DOES NOT EXPLAIN *EVERYTHING*. THERE ARE OTHER REASONS FOR YOUR RACE DESCENT."

links.title: You: ""This has nothing to do with why I'..."
links.text: "This has nothing to do with why I'm here."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOUR LIFE AND THE LIFE OF YOUR RAC..."
links.text: "YOUR LIFE AND THE LIFE OF YOUR RACE REVOLVE AROUND *AL GUL*. IT HAS EVERYTHING TO DO WITH WHY YOU'RE HERE."

links.title: You: ""Understood.""
links.text: "Understood."

links.title: Measurehead: ""I DOUBT IT, MY MICROCEPHALIC RACE..."
links.text: "I DOUBT IT, MY MICROCEPHALIC RACE SERVANT."

links.title: You: "(Smell your breath.) "Kim, is it re..."
links.text: (Smell your breath.) "Kim, is it really so bad?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not good.""
links.text: "It's not good."

links.title: Perception (Smell): "It's like a rat crawled into your s..."
links.text: It's like a rat crawled into your stomach, got drunk and drowned.

links.title: You: ""You're right, I'm an alcoholic. No..."
links.text: "You're right, I'm an alcoholic. Now, I need to enter the harbour."

links.title: Measurehead: ""NO, YOU DON'T, YOU NEED TO GET ANO..."
links.text: "NO, YOU DON'T, YOU NEED TO GET ANOTHER DRINK; OCCIDENTAL HAPLOGROUP B4 IS DONE GIVING ORDERS AROUND HERE. THE INFLUENCE OF THE *HAM SANDWICH RACE* IS WANING."

links.title: Authority: "Show him the ham still got it!"
links.text: Show him the ham still got it!

links.title: Rhetoric: "Does this remind you of someone? Th..."
links.text: Does this remind you of someone? The guy down there...

links.title: You: ""First, let me make this clear: I'm..."
links.text: "First, let me make this clear: I'm not a drunk. I'm a cop. I just have a drink every now and then, everyone does."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE ETHANOL FUNGUS IS DEEP WITHIN..."
links.text: "THE ETHANOL FUNGUS IS DEEP WITHIN YOUR NERVOUS SYSTEM, PULLING THE STRINGS. YOU ARE MERELY ITS *PUPA* NOW. I SEE NO HOPE FOR YOU OR YOUR KIND."

links.title: You: ""That fat racist over there... (Poi..."
links.text: "That fat racist over there... (Point to the racist lorryman.) You're just him after pumping some iron."

links.title: Measurehead: ""LOOK AT MY CRANIOLOGY. I AM THE PI..."
links.text: "LOOK AT MY CRANIOLOGY. I AM THE PINNACLE OF MY HAPLOGROUP. THE PINK BLOB IS A BAD EXAMPLE EVEN OF YOURS. IT SADDENS ME..." He pauses in melancholy reflection. "YOU WERE ONCE A NOBLE AND POWERFUL RACE."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU GAVE THE WORLD *EUGENICS*, ELE..."
links.text: "YOU GAVE THE WORLD *EUGENICS*, ELECTRICITY, AND POWERFUL WEAPONS OF WAR LIKE MISSILES AND AEROSTATIC AIRCRAFT. YOU MADE GREAT GAINS IN METALLURGY, RACE THEORY, AND STATECRAFT."

links.title: You: ""Actually, I think the ham sandwich..."
links.text: "Actually, I think the ham sandwich race still has it in them."

links.title: Measurehead: ""WILLINGLY CALLING YOURSELF A HAM S..."
links.text: "WILLINGLY CALLING YOURSELF A HAM SANDWICH. HOW FAR THE OCCIDENTAL HAPLOGROUP HAS FALLEN..." He pauses in melancholy reflection. "YOU WERE ONCE A NOBLE AND POWERFUL RACE."

links.title: You: ""I am the police and I need you to..."
links.text: "I am the police and I need you to comply -- now!" (Take a step closer.)

links.title: Measurehead: ""JERKING MOTIONS. SIGNS OF A LATE-S..."
links.text: "JERKING MOTIONS. SIGNS OF A LATE-STAGE NEURODEGENERATIVE DISORDER. HOW FAR THE OCCIDENTAL HAPLOGROUP HAS FALLEN..." He pauses in melancholy reflection. "YOU WERE ONCE A NOBLE AND POWERFUL RACE."

links.title: You: ""The race stuff is unimportant here..."
links.text: "The race stuff is unimportant here -- I just need you to help me do my job, please."

links.title: Measurehead: ""BEGGING FOR HELP. ATTEMPTING TO PA..."
links.text: "BEGGING FOR HELP. ATTEMPTING TO PASS FEAR FOR COOPERATION. HOW FAR THE OCCIDENTAL HAPLOGROUP HAS FALLEN..." He pauses in melancholy reflection. "YOU WERE ONCE A NOBLE AND POWERFUL RACE."

links.title: You: ""You're right. I'm a servant of Al..."
links.text: "You're right. I'm a servant of Al Gul, but I still need to enter the harbour."

links.title: You: ""I don't have a problem with Al Gul..."
links.text: "I don't have a problem with Al Gul. I just drink a little on the weekends."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOUR MOUTH MOVES, BUT THE ONE WHO..."
links.text: "YOUR MOUTH MOVES, BUT THE ONE WHO SPEAKS IS AL GUL. YOU ARE BUT A VESSEL FOR THE GHOUL NOW. VERY LITTLE OF YOUR SELF REMAINS."

links.title: Measurehead: ""OCCIDENTAL HAPLOGROUP B4 IS DONE G..."
links.text: "OCCIDENTAL HAPLOGROUP B4 IS DONE GIVING ORDERS AROUND HERE. THE INFLUENCE OF THE *HAM SANDWICH RACE* IS WANING."

links.title: You: ""Enough. I need you to open the doo..."
links.text: "Enough. I need you to open the door to the harbour."

links.title: You: ""My body does *not* betray my degen..."
links.text: "My body does *not* betray my degeneracy!"

links.title: You: ""My body is unimportant.""
links.text: "My body is unimportant."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THAT IS PRECISELY THE NEGLIGENCE T..."
links.text: "THAT IS PRECISELY THE NEGLIGENCE THAT HAS LED YOU TO SUCCUMB TO *AL GUL*." His face contorts in disgust, as if he were smelling a dead rat.

links.title: You: ""My body is unimportant. I'm with t..."
links.text: "My body is unimportant. I'm with the police and we need to get into the harbour."

links.title: You: "Fight."
links.text: Fight.

links.title: Measurehead: "Measurehead stoically looks to the..."
links.text: Measurehead stoically looks to the distance -- in silence.

links.title: You: ""We don't have time to get into thi..."
links.text: "We don't have time to get into this now." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We still need to get into the harb..."
links.text: "We still need to get into the harbour. We need help with the tree situation. There must be another way..."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Try the jump? Up there, on the roof..."
links.text: Try the jump? Up there, on the roof! It'll be worth it. Else there is little choice but to figure out a way to deal with the man...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We still need to get into the harb..."
links.text: "We still need to get into the harbour. There is an interview to conduct. There must be another way..."
